title: Guardians of the Galaxy
plot: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.

subtitles.author: MeadeIndeed
subtitles.srtFileName: Guardians of the Galaxy ENG Subs.srt

39480 42563 Your momma wants

44960 48806 Come on, Pete. Take

90160 93369 They killed a little frog

107680 110331 - Composed out of pure light.

3287360 3288805 But I can't promise

3288960 3290530 I'm not gonna kill every
last one of you jerks.

3290720 3294202 See? That's exactly why
none of you have any friends!

3294840 3297491 Five seconds after you meet somebody,
you're already trying to kill them!

3297560 3301531 We have travelled halfway
across the quadrant.

3301680 3303682 And Ronan is no
closer to being dead.

3314080 3315889 I'm here to fetch
you for my master.
3322200 3324123 Okay, this isn't creepy at all.

3324560 3327404 We house the galaxy's
largest collection

3328120 3330566 of fauna, relics and
species of all manner.
3359320 3361721 How wonderful to meet in the flesh.
3378880 3380530 I never thought I'd meet a Groot.

3382840 3386083 You must allow me to pay you now
so that I may own your carcass.
3386240 3389130 At the moment of your death, of course.

3390680 3393445 Why, so he could turn you
into a frickin' chair?

3398160 3401881 We have been halfway around
the galaxy, retrieving this Orb.
3404280 3406760 Let us see what you brought.

3420440 3423171 Three quarnyx batteries,
seven cases of Cotati seeds.
3423320 3426688 No, cases. Last time you sent me...
3428320 3431244 You shall send a message for me.

3441680 3445401 Then the universe
exploded into existence,
3445560 3447608 and the remnants of these systems

3466920 3472768 These carriers can use the Stone
to mow down entire civilizations.

3477840 3480127 There's a little pee
coming out of me right now.

3482320 3486370 a group was able to share
the energy amongst themselves,

3486520 3489490 but even they were
quickly destroyed by it.

3503800 3507486 We're all very fascinated, whitey.
But we'd like to get paid.
3509400 3510765 How would you like to get paid?

3510920 3512968 What do you think,
fancy man? Units!
3524440 3527125 I will no longer be your slave!

3587040 3589361 How could I think Tivan could
contain whatever was within the Orb?!
3589480 3591562 What do you still have it for?!

3591640 3592971 What are we gonna do,
leave it in there?

3593040 3594963 I can't believe you
had that in your purse!
3595680 3596841 It's not a purse, it's a knapsack!

3597000 3598729 We have to bring this
to the Nova Corps.
3599320 3600731 There's a chance they can contain it.

3601960 3604804 We're wanted by the Nova Corps.
Just give it to Ronan!
3604960 3606200 So he can destroy the galaxy?

3606360 3608169 What are you... some
saint all of a sudden?

3608240 3611289 What has the galaxy ever done for you?
Why would you wanna save it?

3611360 3613169 Because I'm one of the
idiots who lives in it!

3614760 3617969 We cannot allow the Stone
to fall into Ronan's hands.
3618120 3619724 We have to go back to your ship,

3621520 3623921 Right, right, okay.
I think you're right.

3624720 3628645 Or we could give it to somebody
who's not going to arrest us,
3630200 3631884 for a whole lot of money.

3632040 3634566 I think it's a really good balance
between both of your points of view.

3643840 3646366 I shall meet my
foe and destroy him.
3657280 3659408 Don't you move! Get out of the way!

3665840 3668366 You are the one who
transmitted the message?

3680000 3683800 I told you, you can't fit.
Now, wait here. I'll be back.

3689440 3692762 It is Gamora. She is
escaping with the Orb.

3723320 3725243 The Stone is in
the furthest pod.

3755800 3758929 Rocket, keep them off Gamora
until she gets to the Milano.

3759080 3761481 How? We've got no
weaponry on these things.
3852080 3853923 I don't recall killing your family.

3857240 3860608 I doubt I'll remember
killing you, either.

3877240 3880084 Quill, I'm trapped.
I can't make it to the Milano.

3884200 3886168 Wait! These things aren't
meant to go out there.

3904080 3905809 - he'll kill us all.
- Not all.

3971400 3973846 Her body mods should keep her
alive a couple more minutes,

3974000 3976002 but there's nothing
we can do for her.

3976200 3977720 These pods aren't
meant to be out here.

3977840 3980241 In a second, we're gonna
be in the same boat.
4002960 4005088 If you're there, come get me.

4022800 4025883 You can't fit two people
in there. You're gonna die.
4100920 4103400 I don't know what came over me.
4104360 4106203 But I couldn't let you die.

4109040 4111441 I found something
inside of myself.
4124880 4127121 It's... well, they got the Orb.

4162920 4167209 None of this ever would have happened
if you didn't try to single-handedly
4186240 4188527 was just to cover my loss.

4195080 4199449 Oh, boo-hoo-hoo.
"My wife and child are dead."
4201000 4203207 Oh, I don't care if it's mean!

4205920 4209649 It's no excuse to get everybody
else dead along the way!
4213440 4216125 Come on, Groot. Ronan has the Stone.

4216280 4219568 The only chance we got is to get
to the other side of the universe
4219640 4221529 as fast as we can and maybe,

4221680 4226322 just maybe, we'll be able to live full lives
before that whack-job ever gets there.

4235680 4238365 I know they're the only
friends that we ever had

4238440 4241171 but there's an army
of Ravagers around them.
4241320 4242970 And there's only two of us!
4262000 4263729 The Orb is in my possession.

4272280 4277647 Bring you the Orb and you
will destroy Xandar for me.

4277800 4282362 However, now that I know
it contains an Infinity Stone,
4282520 4284522 I wonder what use I have for you.
4284680 4288966 Boy, I would reconsider your current course.

4292520 4295046 Thanos is the most powerful
being in the universe.

4322560 4327279 I will unfurl one thousand
years of Kree justice on Xandar
4327280 4330807 and burn it to its core!
4330960 4335048 Then Thanos, I am coming for you.

4337400 4340500 After Xandar, you are
going to kill my father?
4342800 4344719 You see what he has turned me into.

4344720 4348964 If you kill him, I will help you
destroy a thousand planets.
4355320 4357559 When I picked you up as a kid,
4357560 4359881 these boys wanted to eat you!
4360080 4362550 They ain't never tasted Terran before.

4364440 4366602 Oh, will you shut up
about that?! God!

4366760 4369159 Twenty years you been
throwing that in my face,

4369160 4371891 like it's some great
thing... not eating me.

4371960 4375521 Normal people don't even think
about eating someone else!

4375720 4378166 Much less that person
having to be grateful for it!

4380480 4382721 You stole me from my
home and from my family.

4382880 4385008 You don't give a damn
about your Terra!

4385520 4388808 You're scared because
you're soft in here.

4392800 4395041 Ronan has something
called an Infinity Stone.
4395160 4396969 I know what he's got, girl.
4397160 4399447 Then you know we must get it back!
4399600 4403002 He's gonna use it to wipe out Xandar.

4403160 4406209 We have to warn them.
Billions of people will perish!

4406280 4408931 Is that what she's been
filling your head with, boy?
4411480 4413323 Eating away your brain like maggots!

4422920 4426447 But a captain's gotta teach his men
what happens to those what cross him.

4433080 4437210 ...you are saying goodbye to the
biggest score you have ever seen.

4444520 4446488 I hope you got something
better than that.

4446640 4449291 Because ain't nobody
stealing from Ronan.

4454520 4456887 She knows everything there
is to know about Ronan.
4462800 4464131 Hey, what do you say Yondu, huh?

4464200 4467761 Me and you, taking down a mark
side-by-side like the old days?
4478280 4480806 You always did have a scrote, boy!

4480960 4483691 That's why I kept
you on as a young'un.

4498400 4502200 The lunatic on top of this craft
is holding a Hadron Enforcer.
4502360 4504089 It's a weapon of my own design.

4505840 4508719 If you don't hand over
our companions now...

4508720 4511007 ...he's gonna tear
your ship a new one.

4513080 4515924 - I ain't buyin' it.
- I'm giving you to the count of five.

4516480 4519609 - Five, four, three...
- No! Wait, hold on!
4519760 4521524 Rocket, it's me, for God sakes!
4521680 4523682 We figured it out! We're fine!
4523840 4525400 Oh, hey Quill. What's going on?

4528680 4531001 We're gonna rob the guys
who just beat us senseless.

4531160 4532640 Oh, you want to talk
about senseless?

4532680 4535001 How about trying to save
us by blowing us up?

4535080 4537924 We were only gonna blow you up
if they didn't turn you over!

4538000 4539959 And how on Earth were
they gonna turn us over

4539960 4541520 when you only gave
them a count of five?!

4541640 4545121 We didn't have time to work
out the minutiae of the plan.

4545200 4547521 This is what we get
for acting altruistically.

4549840 4554126 What's important now is we get the
Ravagers' army to help us save Xandar.
4554200 4555759 So we can give the Stone to Yondu

4555760 4557520 who's just gonna sell
to somebody even worse?
4557880 4559200 We'll figure that part out later.

4566840 4567921 First of all, you're
copying me from...

4568040 4569451 - ...when I said I had a plan.
- No, I'm not.

4569600 4572524 People say that all the time.
It's not that unique of a thing to say.
4572600 4574440 Secondly, I don't even believe you have a plan.
4574600 4577331 I have part of a plan!

4577480 4579005 What percentage of
a plan do you have?
4579160 4580679 You don't get to ask questions

4580680 4582320 after the nonsense
you pulled on Knowhere.

4585240 4586924 that you destroying the ship
that I'm on is not saving me.

4587000 4589162 - When did we establish it?
- Like three seconds ago!

4589320 4591500 I wasn't listening. I was
thinking of something else.
4592000 4593520 She's right. You don't get an opinion.

4603080 4607839 That is the most real, authentic,
hysterical laugh of my entire life
4607840 4608920 because that is not a plan.

4614560 4616085 What the hell does that
have to do with anything?

4618880 4622327 See? Groot's the only one
of you who has a clue.

4630440 4632488 Yondu is gonna be
here in two seconds.

4632560 4635040 He expects to hear
this big plan of ours.

4652320 4654482 And we have. Man, we have.
All of us.

4662240 4664971 And usually, life takes more
than it gives. But not today.
4667480 4669050 It has given us a chance.

4681360 4683840 I for one, am not gonna
stand by and watch

4683920 4687003 as Ronan wipes out
billions of innocent lives.

4723360 4726682 I have lived most my life
surrounded by my enemies.

4730720 4734930 I will be grateful
to die among my friends.
4739240 4741163 You are an honorable man, Quill.

4746280 4751808 And in the end, I will see
my wife and daughter again.

4771240 4774483 Oh, what the hell. I don't got
that long a lifespan anyway.

4785520 4788808 Bunch of jackasses
standing in a circle.

4796040 4797565 The Stone reacts
to anything organic.

4797720 4799768 The bigger the target,
the bigger the power surge.
4799840 4803003 All Ronan's got to do is touch the Stone to the planet's surface and zap.
4807080 4809048 So, Ronan does not make the surface.

4812000 4816288 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole
in the Dark Aster's starboard hull.
4816440 4820525 Then, our craft and Yondu's will enter.

4820600 4823410 Won't there be hundreds of
Sakaaran soldiers inside?
4823480 4826324 I think of Sakaaran as paper people.
4832440 4833640 Once they know we're on board,

4833720 4837122 Ronan will isolate himself behind
impenetrable security doors on deck.

4837200 4839646 Which I can disable by
dismantling the power source.

4839800 4844604 We'll make it to the flight deck and I'll
use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan.

4847160 4850243 Once Ronan is dead,
we will retrieve the Stone.
4850760 4852842 Use these devices to contain it.
4853280 4856691 If you touch it, it will kill you.

4859520 4862760 I'll contact one of the Nova
officers who arrested us.

4862840 4864680 Hopefully, they'll believe
we're there to help.

4866080 4869243 There's one more thing
we need to complete the plan.

4872120 4874646 No! No, we don't. No, we
don't need that guy's eye...

4877240 4879846 No seriously, I need it!
It's important to me.

4884520 4889164 Ronan's fleet has been spotted and
will arrive in T-minus fifteen minutes.

4891480 4894806 At the end of all
this, I get the Stone.
4894960 4897406 You cross me, we kill you all.

4932320 4934720 Hey, you're the one who said
you wanted to die among friends.

4942040 4944640 I received a transmission
from one of the Ravagers.

4945200 4947840 He says Ronan's in possession of
something called an Infinity Stone
4950760 4952683 It's a trick. He's a criminal.

4952880 4955326 Did he say why we
should believe him?

4955400 4957759 He said his crew just
escaped from prison

4957760 4960730 so he'd have no other reason
to risk coming to Xandar to help.

4965160 4970607 But he's not... and I'm quoting
him here, "100% a dick".

4972720 4975803 I don't know that I believe
anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am.

4975880 4978804 I mean, do you believe
that he is here to help?

5057480 5060962 Our priority is to get our
people away from the battle.
5112400 5114164 No more games with me, boy!
5114320 5117249 I'll see you at the end of this!
5123520 5124965 There are too many of them, Rocket!
5125720 5127449 We'll never make it up there!

5143760 5146319 This is Denarian Saal
of the Nova Corps.

5146320 5149608 For the record... I advised
against trusting you here.

5193680 5195359 The starboard kern
has been breached!
5198320 5199606 But the Nova Corps have engaged.

5199760 5202411 None of that will matter
once we reach the surface.

5221720 5226089 All Nova pilots interlock
and form a blockade.

5226280 5230126 The Dark Aster must
not reach the ground.
5315240 5316969 When did you learn to do that?
5317520 5320364 Pretty sure the answer is "I am Groot".

5321520 5324046 The flight deck is three
hundred meters this way.

5327280 5330648 I want you all to know that I am grateful
for your acceptance after my blunders.
5331200 5333550 It is pleasing to once again have...

5340480 5343211 - This dumb tree, he is my friend.
- Mmm.
5344720 5345926 And this green whore, she too...
5350440 5353205 Gamora, look at what you have done.

5363440 5365761 Nobody talks to my
friends like that.

5368160 5370811 I'll shut down the power
to the security doors.

5380760 5384242 Order your men to
turn on the Nova Corps!

5452800 5457768 Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots,
enact immolation initiative.

5462880 5464689 Denarian Saal should
we break formation?

5499720 5501324 We'll take care of
the people down here.

5501400 5503607 I can't believe I'm taking
orders from a hamster.
5533360 5536204 You will never make it to Ronan.

5541960 5544201 Everybody shoot them
before they hit the ground.
5597040 5600522 Finger to the throat means death.

5644040 5648401 Your wretched peace treaty
will not save you now.
5648880 5652168 It is the tinder on which you burn!

5707840 5712166 The city's been evacuated but we're
getting our asses kicked down here.

6073120 6080881 Only that my father and his father
shall finally know vengeance.

6081040 6091007 People of Xandar, the time has come to
rejoice and renounce your paltry Gods!

6138680 6141001 I'm distracting you,
ya' big turd blossom.
6268480 6270847 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy.

6309040 6314166 But you got some business to attend
to before all the nookie-nookie starts.

6320720 6322324 I don't know who
you're selling this to...

6322400 6324323 but the only way the
universe can survive...

6324480 6326164 is if you give it
to the Nova Corps.

6327000 6333289 I may be as pretty as an angel
but I sure as hell ain't one.

6357440 6360728 Do not open that Orb.
You know that, right?
6361360 6363806 You've seen what it does to people.

6377680 6380286 It's probably good we didn't
deliver him to his dad...
6381520 6384251 Yeah, that guy was a jackass.

6389120 6392681 He is gonna be so pissed when he
realizes I switched out the Orb on him.
6395440 6397283 He was gonna kill you, Peter.
6402040 6403644 But he was about the only family I had.
6458320 6459720 Why would you even know this?

6460000 6462765 When we arrested you we noticed
an anomaly in your nervous system,
6462840 6464205 so we had it checked out.

6469000 6472641 Your mother was of Earth.
Your father, well...

6472800 6476361 ...he's something very ancient
we've never seen here before.

6476680 6480241 That could be why you were able to
hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6484080 6486321 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

6486720 6489326 we'd like to express
our profound gratitude
6490160 6491889 for your help in saving Xandar.

6493680 6498164 If you will follow Denarian Dey,
he has something to show you.

6508680 6513163 Your wife and child shall rest well
knowing that you have avenged them.
6515000 6516923 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.
6517680 6519842 It's really Thanos I need to kill.

6522520 6525285 We tried to keep it as close
to the original as possible.
6525880 6527848 We salvaged as much as we could.

6544960 6547327 Your criminal records
have also been expunged.

6547480 6551485 However, I have to warn you against
breaking any laws in the future.

6553240 6555811 What if I see something that I want
to take and it belongs to someone else?

6557240 6559481 But what if I want it more
than the person who has it?

6559960 6561962 - It's still illegal.
- That doesn't follow.

6562120 6563520 No I want it more, sir.
Do you understand?

6565120 6566565 Why? I can't have a discussion
with this gentleman?

6566640 6570802 What if someone does something irksome
and I decide to remove his spine?
6578600 6581171 It's one of the worst crimes of all.
6589520 6590681 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.

6619360 6622728 I know these last few months
have been hard for you.
6624000 6626571 But I'm going to a better place.
6629360 6633081 And I will always be with you.
6634800 6637485 You are the light of my life.
6767040 6768690 So, what should we do next?

7226480 7228801 What do you let it
lick you like that for?

subtitles.author: Blue-Bird
lines: 39480 42563 Your mama wants to speak with you.

44960 48806 Come on, Pete.
Take these fool things off.

82640 85883 Why have you been fighting
with the other boys again, baby?

90160 93369 They killed a little frog
that ain't done nothing.

107680 110331 - Composed out of pure light.
- Mer?

110480 112403 You got a present there for Peter,
don't you?
128080 129969 You open it up when I'm gone, okay?
134960 137611 Is gonna take such good care of you.

137760 141560 At least until your daddy
comes back to get you.
172400 173731 You've got to stay here. Please.

511600 513841 - Drop it, now!
- Hey, cool, man. No problem.
516760 518285 How do you know about this?
518360 519930 I don't even know what that is.

520120 522521 I'm just a junker, man.
I was just checking stuff out.

522800 525121 You don't look like a junker.
You're wearing ravager garb.
525280 526520 This is just an outfit, man.
526600 528045 Ninja turtle, you better stop poking me.

529280 531282 My name is Peter Quill, okay?
Dude, chill out.
533160 535083 Ronan may have questions for you.

536760 538888 There's another name
you might know me by.

677600 680160 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest
with you. I forgot you were here.
707240 710767 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor
725800 727006 Ain't no Orb, ain't no you.

727120 729248 Well, I was in the neighborhood.
I thought I'd save you the hassle.
729360 730646 Well, where are you at now, boy?

730720 733291 I feel really bad about this,
but I'm not gonna tell you that.
733400 735880 - I slaved putting this deal together. - Slaved?

736000 737081 Making a few calls is "slaved"?
I mean, really?
737160 738161 And now you're gonna rip me off!
738280 741762 We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers. We got a code.

741880 744611 Yeah, and that code is
"steal from everybody."
744720 746051 When I picked you up on Terra...
747280 748247 these boys of mine wanted to eat you.
749400 750731 They ain't never tasted any Terran before.
750840 753081 I stopped them. You're alive because of me!
753160 754446 I Will find you, I Will...

758640 760290 - But I want him back alive.
- Yeah, cap.
761880 763325 I told you when you picked that kid up,

763400 765368 you should have delivered him
like we was hired to do!
767120 768770 You have always been soft on him.
768840 771411 You're the only one I'm being soft on!
771920 774366 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.
774800 776802 As soon as we get him back here,
780200 781531 What we do need to worry about,
782920 785366 is who else out there wants that orb!
812120 815283 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree,
816200 819522 and punish those who do not.
819680 822809 Because I do not forgive your people
822920 825446 for taking the life of my father,
826040 829487 and his father, and his father before him.
830720 835328 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten!

835800 838644 You can't do this!
Our government signed a peace treaty.

843160 846004 You Xandarians and your culture
are a disease.
874720 876768 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.

876880 879360 But we have discovered
he has an agreement

879520 882285 to retrieve the orb
for an intermediary known

884040 887522 I promised Thanos
I would retrieve the orb for him.
887600 890206 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.

891080 894482 Nebula, go to Xandar
and get me the orb.

898880 901326 If this happens again,
you'll be facing our father
908000 909650 Ronan has already decreed that I...

939920 944369 All of them in a big hurry
to get from something stupid,
948040 949610 Can you believe they call us criminals,

949680 951603 when he's assaulting us
with that haircut?

952120 954930 What is this thing?
Look how it thinks it's so cool.

955000 958561 It's not cool to get help!
Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle.
958720 960643 Look at Mr. Smiles over here.

961280 965001 Where's your wife, old man?
What a Class-A prevert.
968880 970723 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
973520 975488 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.

982400 986405 Okay, humie, how bad
does someone wanna find you?

987880 992044 40,000 units?
Groot, we're gonna be rich!
1013880 1015609 Wanted to be here. Sends his love.
1015720 1016721 And told me to tell you,

1016840 1019081 that you got the best eyebrows
in the business.

1023080 1026448 It's my policy never to discuss
my clients, or their needs.

1026520 1028522 Yeah, well, I almost died
getting it for you.

1028640 1031610 An occupational hazard,
I'm sure, in your line of work.

1032280 1034561 Some machine-headed freak,
working for a dude named Ronan.
1039120 1040804 But I want no part of this transaction

1040880 1042803 - if Ronan is involved.
- Whoa, whoa, whoa!

1045120 1048408 A Kree fanatic,
outraged by the peace treaty,

1048480 1052769 who will not rest
until Xandarian culture, my culture,

1052880 1054041 - is wiped from existence!
- Whoa, whoa!
1055680 1057120 whose bad side I'd rather not be on.
1057160 1058810 What? What about my bad side?
1062480 1063925 Hey, we had a deal, bro!

1073320 1076244 Ah, this guy just backed out
of a deal on me.

1076400 1078482 If there's one thing I hate,
it's a man without integrity.
1078680 1080330 Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.
1081840 1084081 You have the bearing of a man of honor.
1084200 1086328 Well, you know, I wouldn't say that.
1087160 1090050 People say it about me, all the time,

1090160 1091685 but it's not something
I would ever say about myself.

1114160 1116322 Put him in the bag.
Put him in the bag!
1159480 1161289 I don't learn. One of my issues.

1174920 1178003 Quit smiling, you idiot.
You're supposed to be a professional.
1200280 1202726 I live for the simple things.
1202880 1205087 Like how much this is gonna hurt.
1214160 1215605 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot.
1231120 1232565 By the authority of the Nova Corps,

1232640 1234449 - you are under arrest...
- All right. Come on up.
1234520 1236761 For endangerment to life and the destruction of property.

1243440 1245522 I picked this guy up a while back
for petty theft.
1247160 1248207 Yeah. Stay out of the way.

1248280 1250169 Come on, man. It's a...
It's an outlaw name.

1252040 1254247 It's cool to have a code name.
It's not that weird.

1274280 1278205 I should think that would call for some
slight response on the part of the Kree.
1278720 1280006 We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime.

6484061 6486302 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

3257463 3259339 Rocket, no one's calling you a monster.

3274188 3275189 Suck it up for one more lousy night
3287367 3288786 But I can't promise, when all this is over

3477849 3480102 There's a little pee

3597010 3598720 We have to bring this

3618115 3619699 We have to go back to your ship,

3630210 3631878 for a whole lot of money.

3904067 3905819 - he'll kill us all. - NEBULA: Not all.

4002957 4005084 If you're there, come get me.

4100930 4103391 I don't know what came over me.

4109022 4111441 I found something inside of myself.
4124871 4127123 It's... Well, they got the Orb.

4162909 4167205 None of this ever would have happened
if you didn't try to single-handedly
4186224 4188518 was just to cover my loss.

4200988 4203199 Oh, I don't care if it's mean!

4216295 4219549 The only chance we got is

4219632 4221509 as fast as we can and maybe,

4364443 4366612 Oh, will you shut up about that? God!

4369156 4371868 like it's some great thing, not eating me.

4399604 4402982 He's gonna use it to wipe out Xandar.

4411490 4413326 Eating away your brain like maggots!

4433095 4437183 you are saying goodbye to

4446651 4449278 Because ain't nobody stealing

4580659 4581911 after the nonsense

4585247 4586916 that you destroying the ship

4607853 4608854 because that is not a plan.

4683929 4687016 as Ronan wipes out

5709579 5712165 but we're getting our asses kicked down here.

6380416 6381417 like we was hired to do.

6389133 6392678 He is gonna be so pissed when he

6472800 6476345 he's something very ancient

6478013 6480224 to hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6484061 6486313 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

6490150 6491860 for your help in saving Xandar.
6493696 6496407 If you will follow Denarian Dey,

6515009 6516927 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.

6522516 6525269 We tried to keep it as close

6525894 6527855 We salvaged as much as we could.

6547499 6551462 However, I have to warn you against

lines: 37520 40560 Your momma wants to speak with you.

43120 46800 Come on, Pete.

523280 524640 This is just an outfit, man.
524720 526080 Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me.

you might know me by.

675760 678080 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest

705280 708880 protesting the recent peace treaty

723920 725040 Ain't no Orb, ain't no you.

728840 731320 I feel really bad about this,

734080 735120 Making a few calls is "slaved"?

735200 736200 And now you're gonna rip me off!

736320 739880 We do not do that to each other.

740000 742720 Yeah, and that code is
"steal from everybody."
742840 744120 When I picked you up on Terra...

745320 746240 ...these boys of mine
wanted to eat you.

747400 748840 They ain't never tasted
any Terran before.

748960 751120 I stopped them.

751200 752400 I will find you, I will...

760000 761280 I told you when you picked that kid up,

772960 774960 As soon as we get him back here,
778240 779520 What we do need to worry about,
781040 783360 is who else out there wants that Orb!

810200 813320 because I obey the ancient laws

814240 817520 and punish those who do not.
817840 820920 Because I do not forgive your people
821040 823440 for taking the life of my father,

824120 827480 and his father,
and his father before him.

828880 833360 A thousand years of war between us
will not be forgotten!

837920 840160 RONAN: My government

841240 844080 You Xandarians and your culture

869440 872280 KORATH: Master, he is a thief,
872880 874920 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.

875000 877400 But we have discovered

877520 880320 to retrieve the Orb

882120 885520 I promised Thanos

885600 888240 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.

897040 899360 If this happens again,
you'll be facing our father
906120 907640 Ronan has already decreed that I...

946160 947600 Can you believe they call us criminals,

959360 963120 Where's your wife, old man?

967040 968720 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
971560 973480 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.

1012040 1013600 Wanted to be here. Sends his love.

1021200 1024480 It's my policy never to discuss

1037240 1038800 But I want no part of this transaction

an anomaly in your nervous system,
6460880 6462200 so we had it checked out.
6465520 6466880 NOVA PRIME: You are half Terran.

6467040 6470720 Your mother was of Earth.
Your father, well,

6470880 6474520 he's something very ancient
we've never seen here before.
6474760 6475880 That could be why you were able
6476040 6478240 to hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6482080 6484480 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

6484800 6487480 we'd like to express
our profound gratitude
6488160 6489920 for your help in saving Xandar.
6491760 6494560 If you will follow Denarian Dey,
6494720 6496160 he has something to show you.

6506760 6511160 Your wife and child shall rest well
knowing that you have avenged them.
6513040 6514960 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.
6515760 6517920 It's really Thanos I need to kill.

6520640 6523280 We tried to keep it as close
to the original as possible.
6523920 6525920 We salvaged as much as we could.

6543000 6545280 Your criminal records
have also been expunged.

6545640 6549640 However, I have to warn you against
breaking any laws in the future.

6551280 6552560 What if I see something
that I want to take,
6552640 6553880 and it belongs to someone else?

6555280 6557640 But what if I want it more
than the person who has it?

6560160 6561160 No, I want it more, sir.
Do you understand?

6563160 6564680 Why? I can't have a discussion
with this gentleman?

6564760 6566640 What if someone
does something irksome
6566760 6568880 and I decide to remove his spine?
6576720 6579160 It's one of the worst crimes of all.
6587680 6588800 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.
6617360 6620840 I know these last few months have been hard for you.
6622040 6624720 But I'm going to a better place.
6627360 6631120 And I will always be with you.
6632880 6635640 You are the light of my life.
6765120 6766840 PETER: So, what should we do next?

7224560 7226800 HOWARD: What do you let it
lick you like that for?

subtitles.author: JMGacho
lines: 39072 42564 Your momma wants to speak with you.
44510 48810 Come on, Pete. Take these fool things off.
82181 85912 Why have you been fighting with the other boys again, baby?
89756 93350 They killed a little frog that ain't done nothing.
93593 96561 Smushed it with a stick.
97363 100195 You're so like your daddy.
100566 102897 You even look like him.
103736 106227 And he was an angel.
107273 109942 - Composed out of pure light. - Mer?
110042 112442 You got a present there for Peter, don't you?
121421 123718 I've got you covered, Pete.
127660 129991 You open it up when I'm gone, okay?
134534 137236 is gonna take such good care of you.
137336 141602 At least until your daddy comes back to get you.
144977 146444 Take my hand.
152752 154087 Pete, come on.
154187 156382 Take my hand.
163463 166432 No! No! No! No!
167967 169502 - Come with me. - No!
171938 173706 You've got to stay here. Please.
511177 513412 - Drop it, now! - Hey, cool, man. No problem.
513512 515946 No problem at all.
516348 517817 How do you know about this?
517917 519552 I don't even know what that is.
519652 522288 I'm just a junker, man. I was just checking stuff out.
522388 524724 You don't look like a junker. You're wearing Ravager garb.
524824 526092 This is just an outfit, man.
526192 528761 - Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me. - What is your name?
528861 531130 My name is Peter Quill, okay? Dude, chill out.
531230 532631 - Move! - Why?
532731 535034 Ronan may have questions for you.
535134 538595 Hey, you know what? There's another name you might know me by.
542408 546437 - Who? - Star-Lord, man. Legendary outlaw.
547112 549739 - Guys? - Move!
675174 677042 - Bereet. - Bereet!
677142 680076 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest with you. I forgot you're here.
703535 706705 Scattered riots broke out across the Kree Empire today
706805 710309 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor
710409 713378 and Xandar's Nova Prime.
715314 717247 Peter, you have call.
717616 719743 - No, wait, don't! - Quill?
723188 725257 I'm here on Morag.
725357 726558 Ain't no Orb, ain't no you.
726658 728827 Well, I was in the neighborhood. I thought I'd save you the hassle.
728927 730195 Well, where are you at now, boy?
730295 732865 I feel really bad about this, but I'm not gonna tell you that.
732965 735467 - I slaved putting this deal together. - Slaved?
735567 736602 Making a few calls is "slaved"? I mean, really?
736702 737736 And now you're gonna rip me off!
737836 741340 We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers. We got a code.
741440 744176 Yeah, and that code is "steal from everybody."
744276 746145 - When I picked you up on Terra... - "Picked me up."
746245 748181 - ...these boys of mine wanted to eat you. - Yeah?
748281 750316 They ain't never tasted any Terran before.
750416 752651 I stopped them. You're alive because of me!
752751 754445 I will find you, I will...
754753 758090 Put a bounty on him! Forty K.
758190 759825 - But I want him back alive. - Yeah, Cap.
759925 761360 - Alive? - That's what I said.
761460 763799 I told you when you picked that kid up, you should have delivered him
763900 766565 like we was hired to do! He was cargo!
766665 771403 - You have always been soft on him. - You're the only one I'm being soft on!
771503 774273 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.
774373 776841 As soon as we get him back here,
776975 779678 I'm gonna kill him myself.
779778 781575 What we do need to worry about,
782481 785381 is who else out there wants that Orb!
805270 808034 They call me "terrorist,"
811677 815305 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree,
815747 819151 and punish those who do not.
819251 822388 Because I do not forgive your people
822488 825479 for taking the life of my father,
825591 829527 and his father, and his father before him.
830262 835267 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten!
835367 838665 You can't do this! Our government signed a peace treaty.
839371 842101 My government knows no shame.
842741 846039 You Xandarians and your culture are a disease.
848113 850416 will never rule Xandar.
852417 855044 I will cure it!
869001 870869 Korath has returned.
870969 874173 Master, he is a thief,
874273 876341 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.
876441 878977 But we have discovered he has an agreement
879077 881880 to retrieve the Orb for an intermediary known
881980 883515 as The Broker.
883615 887052 I promised Thanos I would retrieve the Orb for him.
887152 890212 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.
890656 894523 Nebula, go to Xandar and get me the Orb.
894826 895994 It will be my honor.
896094 897583 It will be your doom.
898463 900933 If this happens again, you'll be facing our father
901033 902734 without his prize.
902834 904801 I'm a daughter of Thanos.
904903 906038 Just like you.
906138 907473 But I know Xandar.
907573 909241 Ronan has already decreed that I...
909341 910808 Do not speak for me.
912844 915312 You will not fail.
918650 920640 Have I ever?
937202 939404 What a bunch of losers.
939504 944076 All of them in a big hurry to get from something stupid,
944176 946411 to nothing at all. Pathetic.
946511 947479 Look at this guy!
947579 949148 Can you believe they call us criminals,
949248 951583 when he's assaulting us with that haircut?
951683 954453 What is this thing? Look how it thinks it's so cool.
954553 958157 It's not cool to get help! Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle.
958257 960657 Look at Mr. Smiles over here.
960859 965022 Where's your wife, old man? What a class-A prevert.
968433 970335 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
973071 975007 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.
975107 976699 Why are you lying?
979811 981847 Looks like we got one.
981947 986406 Okay, humie, how bad does someone wanna find you?
987419 992083 40,000 units? Groot, we're gonna be rich.
1005604 1007366 - Mr. Quill. - Broker.
1011143 1013345 - As commissioned. - Where's Yondu?
1013445 1015180 Wanted to be here. Sends his love.
1015280 1016315 And told me to tell you,
1016415 1019110 that you got the best eyebrows in the business.
1020852 1022341 What is it?
1022621 1025991 It's my policy never to discuss my clients, or their needs.
1026091 1028126 Yeah, well, I almost died getting it for you.
1028226 1031627 An occupational hazard, I'm sure, in your line of work.
1031830 1034560 Some machine-headed freak, working for a dude named Ronan.
1035534 1037469 Ronan? I'm sorry, Mr. Quill.
1037569 1038570 I truly am.
1038670 1042833 But I want no part of this transaction if Ronan is involved.
1044676 1047913 A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty,
1048013 1052351 who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture,
1052451 1054160 - is wiped from existence! - Come on.
1054261 1056622 He's someone whose bad side I'd rather not be on.
1056722 1060252 - What? What about my bad side? - Farewell, Mr. Quill.
1062027 1063960 Hey, we had a deal, bro!
1072871 1076503 This guy just backed out of a deal on me. If there's one thing I hate,
1076604 1080335 it's a man without integrity. Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.
1081413 1083682 You have the bearing of a man of honor.
1083782 1086341 Well, you know, I wouldn't say that.
1086718 1089155 People say it about me, all the time,
1089255 1091922 but it's not something I would ever say about myself.
1110008 1111634 This wasn't the plan.
1113712 1115914 Put him in the bag. Put him in the bag!
1116014 1118317 No! Not her, him!
1118417 1120316 Learn genders, man.
1121686 1123847 Biting? That's not fair!
1126825 1128986 Take it easy!
1157255 1158957 Fool. You should have learned.
1159057 1161320 I don't learn. One of my issues.
1174473 1178033 Quit smiling, you idiot. You're supposed to be a professional.
1178810 1180679 You gotta be kidding me.
1199831 1202334 I live for the simple things.
1202434 1205095 Like how much this is gonna hurt.
1209574 1212042 Yeah. Writhe, little man.
1213745 1215180 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot.
1225156 1228853 Subject 89P13, drop your weapon.
1230662 1232097 By the authority of the Nova Corps,
1232197 1233999 - you are under arrest... - All right. Come on up.
1234099 1236268 ...for endangerment to life and the destruction of property.
1236368 1239538 Hey! If it isn't Star-Prince.
1239638 1242908 - Star-Lord. - Sorry. "Lord."
1243008 1246611 I picked this guy up a while back for petty theft. He's got a code name.
1246711 1247746 Yeah. Stay out of the way.
1247846 1249714 Come on, man. It's a... It's an outlaw name.
1249814 1251516 Just relax, pal.
1251616 1254175 It's cool to have a code name. It's not that weird.
1269968 1273738 Ronan is destroying Xandarian outposts throughout the galaxy.
1273838 1277706 I should think that would call for some slight response on the part of the Kree.
1277810 1280679 We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime. What more do you want?
1280779 1285116 At least a statement from the Kree Empire saying that they condemn his actions.
1285216 1289221 He is slaughtering children. Families.
1289321 1294181 That is your business. Now, I have other matters to attend to.
1298430 1299865 Well, some good news.
1299965 1303401 It looks like we've apprehended one of Ronan's compatriots.
1303501 1307772 Gamora. Surgically modified and trained as a living weapon.
1307872 1310709 The adopted daughter of the Mad Titan, Thanos.
1310809 1313979 Recently, Thanos lent her and her sister Nebula out to Ronan,
1314079 1317349 which leads us to believe that Thanos and Ronan are working together.
1317449 1321820 Subject 89P13. Calls itself "Rocket."
1321920 1323288 The result of illegal genetic
1323388 1326491 and cybernetic experiments on a lower life form.
1326591 1328660 What the hell?
1328760 1330328 They call it "Groot."
1330428 1332898 A humanoid plant that's been travelling recently
1332998 1336626 as 89P13's personal houseplantlmuscle.
1337669 1340472 Peter Jason Quill, from Terra.
1340572 1343642 Raised from youth by a band of mercenaries called the Ravagers,
1343742 1345577 led by Yondu Udonta.
1347278 1350248 I didn't know how this machine worked.
1350348 1352851 What a bunch of a-holes.
1352951 1355885 Transport all four to the Kyln.
1358289 1361693 I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws,
1361793 1365363 but these ones here, they're corrupt and cruel.
1365463 1369334 But, hey, that's not my problem. I ain't gonna be here long.
1369434 1372904 I've escaped 22 prisons. This one's no different.
1373004 1375574 You're lucky the broad showed up, because otherwise, me and Groot
1375674 1377509 would be collecting that bounty right now,
1377609 1380645 and you'd be getting drawn and quartered by Yondu and those Ravagers.
1380745 1382881 I've had a lot of folks try to kill me over the years.
1382981 1385784 I ain't about to be brought down by a tree and a talking raccoon.
1387052 1388954 - What's a raccoon? - "What's a raccoon?"
1389054 1390355 It's what you are, stupid.
1390455 1393491 Ain't no thing like me, except me.
1393591 1396161 So, this Orb has a real shiny blue suitcase,
1396261 1399753 Ark of the Covenant, Maltese Falcon sort of vibe.
1399898 1401299 - What is it? - I am Groot.
1401399 1403068 So what? What's the Orb?
1403168 1405370 I have no words for an honorless thief.
1405470 1408974 Pretty high and mighty coming from the lackey of a genocidal maniac.
1409074 1410942 Yeah, I know who you are.
1411042 1414713 - Anyone who's anyone knows who you are. - Yeah, we know who you are.
1414813 1417315 - Who is she? - I am Groot.
1417415 1419815 Yeah, you said that.
1420085 1424422 I wasn't retrieving the Orb for Ronan. I was betraying him.
1424522 1426990 I had an agreement to sell it to a third party.
1428460 1429894 I am Groot.
1429994 1434232 Well, that's just as fascinating as the first 89 times you told me that.
1434332 1436501 What is wrong with Giving Tree, here?
1436601 1438803 Well, he don't know talking good like me and you.
1438903 1442974 So his vocabulistics is limited to "I" and "am" and "Groot."
1443074 1444776 Exclusively in that order.
1444876 1447571 I tell you what, that's gonna wear real thin, real fast.
1448480 1451372 Hey. Put that away.
1453418 1455754 Listen to me, you big blue bastard. Take those headphones off.
1455854 1459952 That's mine. Those belong to impound. That tape and that player is mine!
1463094 1468064 Hooked on a Feeling, Blue Swede, 1973. That song belongs to me!
1547378 1550648 - You first! You first! - Murderer!
1550748 1553284 Coming for you first, Gamora! You're dead!
1553384 1558082 You're scum! You're scum!
1560592 1561793 It's like I said,
1561893 1563728 she's got a rep.
1563828 1565797 A lot of prisoners here have lost their families
1565897 1567966 to Ronan and his goons.
1568066 1569334 She'll last a day, tops.
1571102 1572637 The guards will protect her, right?
1572737 1575006 They're here to stop us from getting out.
1575106 1577075 They don't care what we do to each other inside.
1577175 1580712 Whatever nightmares the future holds,
1580812 1584907 are dreams compared to what's behind me.
1585516 1588386 Check out the new meat.
1588486 1592223 I'm gonna slather you up in Gunavian jelly,
1592323 1594085 and go to town...
1598263 1600492 Let's make something clear.
1601199 1604725 This one here is our booty!
1604936 1607233 You wanna get to him,
1607372 1609567 you go through us!
1609908 1612610 Or, more accurately,
1612710 1615610 we go through you.
1625156 1627419 I'm with them.
1628526 1630618 I hate you.
1630962 1633953 No cell's gonna protect you for long.
1675073 1676841 Take her down to the showers.
1676941 1680239 It'll be easier to clean up the blood down there.
1692457 1694219 Quill, where you going?
1699030 1702533 Gamora, consider this a death sentence
1702633 1704769 for your crimes against the galaxy.
1712243 1714574 You know who I am, yes?
1719617 1721586 And you know why they call me this.
1721686 1724711 You slayed dozens of Ronan's minions.
1724922 1728192 Ronan murdered my wife, Ovette,
1728292 1730726 and my daughter, Camaria.
1731062 1733291 He slaughtered them where they stood.
1733831 1735566 And he laughed!
1738636 1741070 is not yours to take.
1742073 1745064 He killed my family.
1745309 1746935 I shall kill one of his in return.
1747745 1750406 Of course, Drax. Here, I...
1756821 1758652 Quill! What are you doing?
1758756 1762453 I'm no family to Ronan or Thanos.
1771602 1773763 I'm your only hope at stopping him.
1775306 1778009 Woman, your words mean nothing to me!
1778109 1780645 - Hey! Hey, hey, hey! Hey! - Crap.
1780745 1782914 You know, if killing Ronan is truly your sole purpose,
1783014 1784811 I don't think this is the best way to go about it.
1785016 1788152 Are you not the man this wench attempted to kill?
1788252 1790621 Well, I mean, she's hardly the first woman to try and do that to me.
1790721 1794292 Look, this is from a smoking-hot Rajak girl.
1794392 1797628 Stabbed me with a fork. Didn't like me skipping out on her at sunrise.
1797728 1800298 I got, right here, a Kree girl tried to rip out my thorax.
1800398 1803568 She caught me with this skinny little A'askavariian who worked in Nova Records.
1803668 1807071 I was trying to get information. You ever see an A'askavariian?
1807171 1809040 They have tentacles, and needles for teeth.
1809140 1811835 If you think I'm seriously interested in that, then...
1812343 1815368 You don't care. But here's the point.
1816614 1819912 She betrayed Ronan. He's coming back for her.
1820118 1821710 And when he does,
1821853 1824150 that's when you...
1824689 1827658 Why would I put my finger on his throat?
1831028 1832096 No, it's a symbol.
1832196 1836868 This is a symbol for you slicing his throat.
1836968 1838936 I would not slice his throat.
1839036 1841806 I would cut his head clean off.
1841906 1844008 It's a general expression for you killing somebody.
1844108 1845643 You've heard of this. You've seen this, right?
1845743 1847178 - You know what that is. - Yeah. Yeah.
1847278 1849405 - Everyone knows. - No, no.
1851048 1854517 What I'm saying is, you want to keep her alive.
1854752 1857584 Don't do his work for him.
1870501 1872969 I like your knife. I'm keeping it.
1873638 1875807 - That was my favorite knife. - Listen!
1875907 1879043 I could care less whether you live or whether you die.
1879143 1882305 - Then why stop the big guy? - Simple.
1882413 1883714 You know where to sell my Orb.
1883814 1886509 How are we gonna sell it when we and it are still here?
1887285 1888809 My friend Rocket, here,
1888920 1890682 has escaped 22 prisons.
1890855 1892023 We're getting out.
1892123 1895093 And then we're headed straight to Yondu to retrieve your bounty.
1895193 1899288 How much was your buyer willing to pay you for my Orb?
1900198 1901466 Four billion units.
1901566 1903401 - What? - Holy shit.
1903501 1907528 That Orb is my opportunity to get away from Thanos and Ronan.
1907838 1909464 If you free us,
1910975 1914245 I'll lead you to the buyer directly and I'll split the profit between the three of us.
1914345 1916414 I am Groot.
1916514 1917582 Four of us.
1917682 1921251 Asleep for the danger, awake for the money, as per frickin' usual.
1922620 1925623 You have been betrayed, Ronan.
1925723 1927850 We know only that she has been captured.
1928392 1930461 Gamora may yet recover the Orb.
1930561 1934999 No! Our sources within the Kyln say Gamora has her own plans for the Orb.
1935099 1937702 Look, your partnership with Thanos
1937802 1939997 is at risk.
1940471 1944498 Thanos requires your presence. Now!
1949847 1953651 With all due respect, Thanos, your daughter made this mess,
1953751 1955253 and yet you summon me.
1955353 1957255 I would lower my voice, Accuser.
1957355 1959423 First, she lost a battle with some primitive.
1959523 1961392 Thanos put Gamora under your charge.
1961492 1964262 Then she was apprehended by the Nova Corps.
1964362 1966164 You are the one here with nothing to show for it.
1966264 1970368 Your sources say that she meant to betray us the whole time!
1970468 1971802 Lower your tone!
1971902 1973369 I may be your...
1981112 1985480 I only ask that you take this matter seriously.
1986150 1990154 The only matter I do not take seriously, boy,
1992256 1994825 Your politics bore me.
1994925 1997995 Your demeanor is that of a pouty child.
1998095 2003259 And, apparently, you alienated my favorite daughter, Gamora.
2005303 2008339 I shall honor our agreement, Kree,
2008439 2010702 if you bring me the Orb.
2011142 2014133 But return to me again empty-handed,
2014245 2017612 and I will bathe the starways in your blood.
2020484 2022849 Thanks, Dad. Sounds fair.
2024689 2027885 This is one fight you won't win.
2028626 2030787 Let's head to the Kyln.
2038869 2041973 If we're gonna get out of here, we're gonna need to get into that watchtower.
2042073 2044200 And to do that, I'm gonna need a few things.
2044675 2049280 The guards wear security bands to control their ins and outs. I need one.
2049380 2050815 Leave it to me.
2050915 2053718 That dude, there. I need his prosthetic leg.
2053818 2055553 - His leg? - Yeah.
2055653 2058155 God knows I don't need the rest of him. Look at him, he's useless.
2059357 2063661 And finally, on the wall back there is a black panel. Blinky yellow light.
2063761 2065730 - Do you see it? - Yeah.
2065830 2069967 There's a quarnyx battery behind it. Purplish box, green wires.
2070067 2072203 To get into that watchtower, I definitely need it.
2072303 2073704 How are we supposed to do that?
2073804 2076073 Well, supposably, these bald-bodies find you attractive.
2076173 2077808 So, maybe you can work out some sort of trade.
2077908 2079043 You must be joking.
2079143 2080911 No, I really heard they find you attractive.
2081011 2082613 Look, it's 20 feet up in the air,
2082713 2085116 and it's in the middle of the most heavily-guarded part of the prison.
2085216 2087985 It's impossible to get up there without being seen.
2088085 2091289 I got one plan, and that plan requires a frickin' quarnyx battery,
2091389 2092981 so figure it out!
2093891 2095826 Can I get back to it? Thanks.
2095926 2099497 Now, this is important. Once the battery is removed,
2099597 2101966 everything is gonna slam into emergency mode.
2102066 2108202 Once we have it, we gotta move quickly, so you definitely need to get that last.
2113444 2115579 Or we could just get it first and improvise.
2115679 2118204 - I'll get the armband. - Leg.
2129860 2133898 Prisoner, drop the device immediately and retreat to your cell,
2133998 2136329 or we will open fire.
2160958 2163756 All prisoners return to your sleeping areas.
2170401 2173597 How am I supposed to fight these things without my stuff?
2179376 2181011 The animal is in control.
2181111 2183545 Fire on my command!
2202500 2204365 Creepy little beast!
2225489 2227752 You need my what?
2243440 2245042 - I'll need this. - Good luck.
2245142 2246577 It's internally wired.
2246677 2248769 I'll figure something out.
2251849 2253417 Drop the leg!
2253517 2256577 Drop the leg and move back to your cell!
2275172 2278004 Move to the watchtower!
2310574 2312632 Man who has lain with an A'askavariian!
2313577 2316136 It was one time, man.
2317481 2320472 We need all available guards in full combat gear...
2342406 2344339 Spare me your foul gaze, woman.
2345009 2346498 Why is this one here?
2346610 2349146 We promised him he could stay by your side until he kills your boss.
2349246 2352182 I always keep my promises, when they're to muscle-bound whack-jobs
2352282 2354010 who will kill me if I don't. Here you go.
2354351 2357154 I was just kidding about the leg. I just need these two things.
2357254 2358956 - What? - No, I thought it'd be funny.
2359056 2361959 Was it funny? Wait, what did he look like hopping around?
2362059 2364459 I had to transfer him 30,000 units!
2366897 2368455 How are we going to leave?
2370100 2373437 Well, he's got a plan. Right? Or is that another thing you made up?
2373537 2375139 I have a plan! I have a plan!
2375239 2378576 Cease your yammering and relieve us from this irksome confinement.
2378676 2381946 Yeah, I'll have to agree with the walking thesaurus on that one.
2382046 2384980 Do not ever call me a thesaurus.
2385315 2386417 It's just a metaphor, dude.
2386517 2389386 His people are completely literal. Metaphors are gonna go over his head.
2389486 2391188 Nothing goes over my head.
2391288 2394848 My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.
2395059 2399325 I'm gonna die surrounded by the biggest idiots in the galaxy.

4785104 4788801 Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle.

4799385 4802622 All Ronan's got to do is touch the Stone to the planet's surface and zap.
4802722 4804423 All plants, animals,
4804523 4806456 - Nova Corps. - Everything will die.

4811564 4813599 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole

4831717 4833152 Once they know we're on board,
4833252 4836656 Ronan will isolate himself behind impenetrable security doors on deck.
4836756 4839258 Which I can disable by dismantling the power source.
4839358 4841060 We'll make it to the flight deck,
4841160 4844629 and I'll use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan.

4850302 4852738 Use these devices to contain it.
4852838 4854635 If you touch it,
4854907 4856704 it will kill you.

4865618 4869246 There's one more thing we need to complete the plan.
4869555 4871215 That guy's eye.
4871690 4874260 No! No, we don't. No, we don't need
4874360 4876157 that guy's eye.
4876796 4879856 No, seriously, I need it! It's important to me.
4884069 4887006 Ronan's fleet has been spotted, and will arrive in T-minus
4891043 4892978 At the end of all this,
4893078 4894413 I get the Stone.
4894513 4897413 You cross me, we kill you all.
4919605 4921402 Let's go get 'em, boys!
4930449 4931751 This is a terrible plan.
4931851 4934410 Hey, you're the one who said you wanted to die among friends.
4941560 4942862 I received a transmission
4942962 4944656 from one of the Ravagers.
4944763 4947399 He says Ronan's in possession of something called an Infinity Stone
4947499 4948868 and he's headed toward Xandar.
4950336 4952304 It's a trick. He's a criminal.
4952404 4954874 Did he say why we should believe him?
4954974 4957209 He said his crew just escaped from prison
4957309 4960744 so he'd have no other reason to risk coming to Xandar to help.
4961080 4962706 He says that he's an
4964717 4965985 But he's not,
4966085 4967820 and I'm quoting him, here,
4967920 4970222 "100% a dick."
4970322 4972084 Do you believe him?
4972291 4975327 I don't know that I believe anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am.
4975427 4978828 I mean, do you believe that he is here to help?
4993178 4994980 A fleet approaches.
4995080 4997138 They appear to be Ravagers.
5020205 5021440 Cover it down.
5044096 5045364 All pilots, dive!
5045464 5047090 They're beneath us!
5055474 5056942 Evacuate the city.
5057042 5061000 Our priority is to get our people away from the battle.
5067519 5069008 Forward thrust, now!
5084803 5086827 Quill! Yondu! Now!
5110362 5111864 I'm going down, Quill!
5111964 5113766 No more games with me, boy!
5113866 5114967 I'll see you
5115067 5117262 at the end of this!
5123108 5124973 There are too many of them, Rocket!
5125277 5127472 We'll never make it up there!
5143328 5145764 This is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps.
5145864 5149234 For the record, I advised against trusting you here.
5149334 5151036 They got my "dick" message!
5151136 5152762 Prove me wrong.
5187339 5189466 We're just like Kevin Bacon.
5193245 5194813 The starboard kern has been breached!
5194913 5196215 We have been boarded.
5196315 5197783 Continue our approach.
5197883 5199218 But the Nova Corps have engaged.
5199318 5201987 None of that will matter once we reach the surface.
5202087 5203188 Seal security doors!
5206091 5208821 Get out of my way!
5221273 5225711 All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade.

5246965 5248432 We're locked in.
5286271 5288864 I can barely see.
5314766 5316969 When did you learn to do that?
5317069 5318237 Pretty sure the answer is
5318337 5320361 "I am Groot."
5321073 5324041 The flight deck is 300 meters this way.
5326845 5330649 I want you all to know that I am grateful for your acceptance after my blunders.
5330749 5333444 It is pleasing to once again have
5335687 5338557 You, Quill, are my friend.
5340025 5342584 This dumb tree, he is my friend.
5344263 5347564 - And this green whore, she, too... - You must stop!
5350002 5355607 Gamora, look at what you have done. You have always been weak.
5355707 5358266 You stupid, traitorous...
5363015 5365779 Nobody talks to my friends like that.
5366451 5370779 Head to the flight deck. I'll shut down the power to the security doors.
5380299 5384257 Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps.
5400585 5402187 Enough nonsense, Ravager!
5402287 5404550 Time to die...
5452337 5455140 Enough of this. Necrocraft pilots,
5455240 5457765 enact immolation initiative.
5460846 5462347 They're dive-bombing the city!
5462447 5464283 Denarian Saal, should we break formation?
5464383 5466475 No! Hold your positions.
5497682 5499151 Keep Ronan up there, Saal.
5499251 5500886 We'll take care of the people down here.
5500986 5503613 I can't believe I'm taking orders from a hamster.
5532918 5536216 You will never make it to Ronan.
5541493 5544223 Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground.
5596615 5600551 Finger to the throat means death.
5640158 5643218 You stand accused.
5643595 5646665 Your wretched peace treaty will not
5646765 5648366 save you now.
5648466 5652163 It is the tinder on which you burn.
5677495 5679724 Hold on, Saal, just...
5706024 5707292 Quill, you gotta hurry.
5707392 5709027 The city's been evacuated,
5709127 5711696 but we're getting our asses kicked down here.
5711796 5713695 Gamora hasn't opened the door!
5740525 5743128 Sister, help us fight Ronan.
5743228 5745063 You know he's crazy.
5745163 5747265 I know you're both crazy.
5796648 5798115 You did it!
5824175 5825443 I was mistaken.
5825543 5827601 I do remember your family.
5827779 5829581 Their screams were
5953872 5955774 Why are you doing this?
6033518 6036009 I called him an idiot.
6058276 6060676 You killed Groot!
6066584 6070021 Your guardians of the galaxy.
6070121 6072557 What fruit have they wrought?
6072657 6076761 Only that my father and his father
6076861 6080498 shall finally know vengeance.
6080598 6083293 People of Xandar,
6083468 6085270 the time has come
6085370 6088239 to rejoice and renounce
6088339 6091034 your paltry gods!
6091409 6095208 Your salvation is at hand.
6107492 6109459 Listen to these words.
6118069 6120196 Now bring it down hard!
6123174 6124642 What are you doing?
6124742 6127767 Dance-off, bro. Me and you.
6133184 6135586 Subtle. Take it back.
6135686 6138122 What are you doing?
6138222 6141020 I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom.
6192276 6195870 Peter! Take my hand!
6200818 6203286 Take my hand, Peter.
6205656 6208181 Take my hand!
6265716 6267919 You said it yourself, bitch.
6268019 6270851 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy.
6300251 6301919 Well, well, well.
6302019 6303543 Quite the light show.
6305389 6307516 Ain't this sweet.
6308626 6311162 But you got some business to attend to
6311262 6314162 before all the nookie-nookie starts.
6315399 6317635 Peter, you can't. Peter.
6317735 6321839 You gotta reconsider this, Yondu. I don't know who you're selling this to,
6321939 6326168 but the only way the universe can survive is if you give it to the Nova Corps.
6326544 6329171 I may be as pretty as an angel,
6330982 6333313 but I sure as hell ain't one.
6334552 6336519 Hand it over, son.
6357008 6360739 Do not open that Orb. You know that, right?
6360911 6363845 You've seen what it does to people.
6374125 6376820 Yeah, Quill turned out okay.
6377228 6379864 It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad
6379964 6380965 like we was hired to do.
6381065 6384261 Yeah, that guy was a jackass.
6388673 6392700 He is gonna be so pissed when he realizes I switched out the Orb on him.
6394979 6397276 He was gonna kill you, Peter.
6401585 6403677 But he was about the only family I had.
6457875 6459443 Why would you even know this?
6459543 6462280 When we arrested you, we noticed an anomaly in your nervous system,
6462380 6464245 so we had it checked out.
6465082 6466784 I'm not Terran?
6466884 6468452 You are half Terran.
6468552 6472256 Your mother was of Earth. Your father, well,
6472356 6476127 he's something very ancient we've never seen here before.
6476227 6480256 That could be why you were able to hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6480698 6482165 Your friends have arrived.
6483601 6486170 On behalf of the Nova Corps,
6486270 6491868 we'd like to express our profound gratitude for your help in saving Xandar.
6493244 6496013 If you will follow Denarian Dey,
6496113 6499877 - he has something to show you. - Thank you, Nova Prime.
6508225 6513130 Your wife and child shall rest well knowing that you have avenged them.
6514565 6516930 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.
6517234 6519861 It's really Thanos I need to kill.
6522072 6525302 We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible.
6525443 6527877 We salvaged as much as we could.
6536187 6538255 I have a family.
6538355 6540288 They're alive because of you.
6544528 6546964 Your criminal records have also been expunged.
6547064 6551466 However, I have to warn you against breaking any laws in the future.
6551635 6553938 Question. What if I see something that I want to take,
6554038 6556707 - and it belongs to someone else? - You will be arrested.
6556807 6559410 But what if I want it more than the person who has it?
6559510 6561312 - It's still illegal. - That doesn't follow.
6561412 6564148 No, I want it more, sir. Do you understand? What are you laughing at?
6564248 6566083 Why? I can't have a discussion with this gentleman?
6566183 6568085 What if someone does something irksome
6568185 6570846 and I decide to remove his spine?
6574158 6576819 That's actually murder.
6578162 6580765 It's one of the worst crimes of all.
6580865 6584163 So... also illegal.
6587304 6588793 They'll be fine, Dey.
6589039 6590274 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.
6618903 6622702 I know these last few months have been hard for you.
6623541 6626210 But I'm going to a better place.
6626310 6628813 And I will be okay.
6628913 6633110 And I will always be with you.
6634351 6637087 You are the light of my life.
6637187 6639882 My precious son.
6640391 6643792 My little Star-Lord.
6766617 6768485 So, what should we do next?
6772222 6774314 A bit of both?
6775492 6778859 We'll follow your lead, Star-Lord.
6780664 6782153 Bit of both.
7226042 7228806 What do you let it lick you like that for?
7235852 7238149 But it burns going down.

lines: 39680 42763 Your momma wants to speak with you.

45160 49006 Come on, Pete.
Take these fool things off.

82840 86083 Why have you been fighting

90360 93569 They killed a little frog

107880 110531 - Composed out of pure light.

don't you?
128280 130169 You open it up when I'm gone, okay?
135160 137811 ...is gonna take such good care of you.

137960 141760 At least until your daddy

520320 522721 I'm just a junker, man.

523000 525321 You don't look like a junker.

525480 526775 This is just an outfit, man.
526800 528245 Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me.

Dude, chill out.
533360 535283 Ronan may have questions for you.

677800 680360 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest
with you. I forgot you're here.
704160 705800 REPORTER ON TV: Scattered riots broke out
707440 711015 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor

727320 729448 Well, I was in the neighborhood.
I thought I'd save you the hassle.
729560 730895 Well, where are you at now, boy?

730920 733491 I feel really bad about this,
but I'm not gonna tell you that.
733600 736080 - I slaved putting this deal together. - Slaved?

736200 737335 Making a few calls is "slaved"?
I mean, really?
737360 738361 And now you're gonna rip me off!
738480 741962 We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers. We got a code.

742080 744811 Yeah, and that code is
"steal from everybody."
744920 746251 When I picked you up on Terra..
747480 748495 ...these boys of mine wanted to eat you.
749600 750931 They ain't never tasted any Terran before.
751040 753335 I stopped them. You're alive because of me!

762080 763575 I told you when you picked that kid up,

763600 765568 you should have delivered him

767320 769015 You have always been soft on him.
769040 771611 You're the only one I'm being soft on!
772120 774566 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.
775000 777002 As soon as we get him back here,
780400 781731 What we do need to worry about,
783120 785566 is who else out there wants that Orb!
812320 815483 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree,
819880 823009 Because I do not forgive your people
823120 825646 for taking the life of my father,
826240 829687 and his father, and his father before him.
830920 835528 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten!

836000 838844 XANDARIAN: You can't do this!
Our government signed a peace treaty.

840000 842287 RONAN: My government
knows no shame.

843360 846204 You Xandarians and your culture
are a disease.
871600 874444 KORATH: Master, he is a thief,
874920 876968 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.

877080 879560 But we have discovered
he has an agreement

879720 882485 to retrieve the Orb
for an intermediary known

884240 887775 I promised Thanos
I would retrieve the Orb for him.
887800 890406 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.

891280 894682 Nebula, go to Xandar
and get me the Orb.

899080 901526 If this happens again,
you'll be facing our father
908200 909850 Ronan has already decreed that I...

940120 944569 All of them in a big hurry
to get from something stupid,
948240 949855 Can you believe they call us criminals,

949880 951803 when he's assaulting us
with that haircut?

952320 955175 What is this thing?

Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle.

958920 960843 Look at Mr. Smiles over here.
(INAUDIBLE)

961480 965201 Where's your wife, old man?
What a class-A prevert.
969080 970923 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
973720 975735 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.

982600 986605 Okay, humie, how bad
does someone wanna find you?

988080 992295 40,000 units?
Groot, we're gonna be rich.
1014080 1015809 Wanted to be here. Sends his love.
1015920 1016921 And told me to tell you,

1017040 1019335 that you got the best eyebrows

1023280 1026695 It's my policy never to discuss

1026720 1028722 Yeah, well, I almost died

1028840 1031810 An occupational hazard,
I'm sure, in your line of work.

1032480 1034761 Some machine-headed freak,
working for a dude named Ronan.
1039320 1041055 But I want no part of this transaction

1041080 1043003 - if Ronan is involved.
- Whoa, whoa, whoa!

1045320 1048655 A Kree fanatic,
outraged by the peace treaty,

1048680 1052969 who will not rest
until Xandarian culture, my culture,

1055880 1057320 whose bad side I'd rather not be on.
1057360 1059010 What? What about my bad side?
1062680 1064125 Hey, we had a deal, Bro!

1073520 1076444 Ah, this guy just backed out of a deal
on me.

1076600 1078682 If there's one thing I hate,
it's a man without integrity.
1078880 1080530 Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.
1082040 1084281 You have the bearing of a man of honor.
1084400 1086528 Well, you know, I wouldn't say that.
1087360 1090250 People say it about me, all the time,

1090360 1091885 but it's not something
I would ever say about myself.

1114360 1116522 ROCKET: Put him in the bag.
Put him in the bag!
1159680 1161489 I don't learn. One of my issues.

1175120 1178255 Quit smiling, you idiot.
You're supposed to be a professional.
1200480 1202926 I live for the simple things.
1203080 1205287 Like how much this is gonna hurt.
1214360 1215805 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot.
1231320 1232815 By the authority of the Nova Corps,

1232840 1234695 - you are under arrest...
- All right. Come on up.
1234720 1236975 ...for endangerment to life and the destruction of property.

1243640 1245722 I picked this guy up a while back
for petty theft.
1247360 1248455 OFFICER: Yeah. Stay out of the way.

1248480 1250415 Come on, man. It's a...
It's an outlaw name.

1252240 1254447 It's cool to have a code name.
It's not that weird.

1274480 1278405 I should think that would call for some
slight response on the part of the Kree.
1278920 1280255 We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime.

1281600 1283415 At least a statement
from the Kree Empire
1283440 1285681 saying that they condemn his actions.
1292320 1294368 Now, I have other matters to attend to.

1300600 1303649 It looks like we've apprehended
one of Ronan's compatriots.

1305920 1308366 Surgically modified
and trained as a living weapon.

1308520 1311000 The adopted daughter
of the Mad Titan, Thanos.

1311440 1314569 Recently, Thanos lent her
and her sister Nebula out to Ronan,

1314720 1317929 which leads us to believe that Thanos
and Ronan are working together.

1331080 1333575 A humanoid plant
that's been travelling recently

1341200 1344204 Raised from youth by a band
of mercenaries called the Ravagers,
1347920 1350810 I didn't know how this machine worked.
1353600 1356046 SAAL: Transport all four to the Kyln.

1358920 1362288 ROCKET: I guess most of Nova Corps
wanna uphold the laws,

1362440 1365808 but these ones here,
they're corrupt and cruel.

1366120 1368202 (CHUCKLING)
But, hey, that's not my problem.
1368360 1369930 I ain't gonna be here long.

1370080 1373482 I've escaped 22 prisons.
This one's no different.
1373640 1375015 You're lucky the broad showed up,

1376320 1378215 would be collecting that bounty
right now,

1378240 1380163 and you'd be getting
drawn and quartered

1381360 1383615 I've had a lot of folks
try to kill me over the years.

1383640 1386405 I ain't about to be brought down
by a tree and a talking raccoon.

1387680 1389600 - What's a raccoon?
PETER: - "What's a raccoon?"
1391080 1393845 Ain't no thing like me, except me.

1394200 1396855 So, this Orb has
a real shiny blue suitcase,

1396880 1399929 Ark of the Covenant,
Maltese Falcon sort of vibe.

1400520 1401851 - What is it?
- I am Groot.
1403800 1405928 I have no words for an honorless thief.

1406120 1408327 Pretty high and mighty
coming from the lackey
1409680 1411655 Yeah, I know who you are.

1411680 1413682 Anyone who's anyone
knows who you are.
1413880 1415415 Yeah, we know who you are.

1415440 1418015 - Who is she?
- I am Groot.
1420720 1423200 I wasn't retrieving the Orb for Ronan.

1425160 1427162 I had an agreement
to sell it to a third party.

1430640 1434935 Well, that's just as fascinating
as the first 89 times you told me that.
1434960 1437042 What is wrong with Giving Tree, here?

1437200 1439535 Well, he don't know
talking good like me and you.

1439560 1443695 So his vocabulistics is limited
to "I" and "am" and "Groot."

1445520 1447775 I tell you what,
that's gonna wear real thin, real fast.

1454080 1456321 Listen to me, you big blue bastard.
Take those headphones off.
1456480 1458130 That's mine. Those belong to impound.
1458280 1460175 That tape and that player is mine!

1551360 1553975 Coming for you first, Gamora!
You're dead!

1564480 1566369 A lot of prisoners here
have lost their families
1571720 1573120 The guards will protect her, right?
1573360 1575567 They're here to stop us from getting out.

1575720 1577643 They don't care
what we do to each other inside.

1581440 1585081 are dreams
compared to what's behind me.

1589120 1592806 I'm gonna slather you up
in Gunavian jelly,
1601840 1604889 This one here is our booty!
1631600 1634175 No cell's gonna protect you for long.
1675720 1677160 GUARD: Take her down to the showers.

1677600 1679375 It'll be easier to clean up
the blood down there.
1699640 1703122 Gamora, consider this a death sentence
1703280 1705455 for your crimes against the galaxy.
1712880 1714769 You know who I am, yes?

1720240 1722163 DRAX: And you know
why they call me this.
1722320 1724891 You slayed dozens of Ronan's minions.
1731680 1733489 He slaughtered them where they stood.
1745960 1747320 I shall kill one of his in return.
1759360 1762648 I'm no family to Ronan or Thanos.
1772240 1773924 I'm your only hope at stopping him.

1775920 1778571 Woman, your words
mean nothing to me!

1778720 1781246 - Hey! Hey, hey, hey! Hey!

1781400 1783615 You know, if killing Ronan
is truly your sole purpose,

1783640 1785600 I don't think this is

1785640 1788723 Are you not the man

1788920 1790126 Well, I mean,
she's hardly the first woman
1790240 1791241 to try and do that to me. (CHUCKLES)

1791360 1794569 Look, this is from
a smoking-hot Rajak girl.

1796240 1798335 Didn't like me skipping out on her
at sunrise.

1798360 1800886 I got, right here, a Kree girl

1801040 1803135 She caught me with
this skinny little A'askavariian
1804280 1805975 I was trying to get information.

1807800 1809609 They have tentacles,
and needles for teeth.

1809760 1812001 If you think I'm seriously interested
in that, then...

1812960 1815566 You don't care. But here's the point.
(BREATHING HEAVILY)

1817280 1820124 She betrayed Ronan.
He's coming back for her.

1825320 1827971 Why would I put
my finger on his throat?

1832840 1837084 This is a symbol
for you slicing his throat.
1837600 1839568 I would not slice his throat.
1839680 1842365 I would cut his head clean off.

1842560 1844608 It's a general expression
for you killing somebody.

1844760 1846335 You've heard of this.
You've seen this, right?

1846360 1847840 - You know what that is.
- Yeah. Yeah.

1851680 1854684 What I'm saying is,
you want to keep her alive.
1855400 1857767 Don't do his work for him.
1871160 1873162 I like your knife. I'm keeping it.
1874280 1876362 - That was my favorite knife. PETER: - Listen!

1876520 1879603 I could care less
whether you live or whether you die.

1879800 1882485 - Then why stop the big guy?
- Simple.
1883040 1884280 You know where to sell my Orb.

1884440 1886681 How are we gonna sell it
when we and it are still here?

1892760 1895684 And then we're headed straight
to Yondu to retrieve your bounty.

1895840 1899481 How much was your buyer

1904160 1907687 That Orb is my opportunity to
get away from Thanos and Ronan.
1911600 1913095 I'll lead you to the buyer directly

1913120 1914849 and I'll split the profit
between the three of us.

1918320 1920375 Asleep for the danger,
awake for the money,

1926360 1928044 We know only that
she has been captured.
1929040 1931175 Gamora may yet recover the Orb.
1931200 1935569 No! Our sources within the Kyln say Gamora has her own plans for the Orb.

1950640 1954375 RONAN: With all due respect, Thanos,
your daughter made this mess,
1956000 1957975 I would lower my voice, Accuser.

1958000 1960135 First, she lost a battle
with some primitive.
1960160 1961969 Thanos put Gamora under your charge.

1962120 1964851 RONAN: Then she was apprehended

1965000 1966895 You are the one here
with nothing to show for it.

5380960 5384442 Order your men

should we break formation?
5499920 5501575 We'll take care of the people down here.

5501600 5503807 I can't believe
I'm taking orders from a hamster.
5533560 5536404 You will never make it to Ronan.

5597240 5600722 Finger to the throat means death.
5649080 5652368 It is the tinder on which you burn.
5709760 5712415 but we're getting our asses kicked down here.
6073320 6077495 Only that my father and his father

6138880 6141255 I'm distracting you,
you big turd blossom.
6268680 6271095 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy.
6309240 6311766 But you got some business to attend to
6320920 6322575 I don't know who you're selling this to,

6322600 6324523 but the only way
the universe can survive
6324680 6326364 is if you give it to the Nova Corps.
6327200 6329362 I may be as pretty as an angel,
6331600 6333489 but I sure as hell ain't one.

6357640 6360928 Do not open that Orb.
You know that, right?
6361560 6364006 You've seen what it does to people.

6377880 6380486 It's probably good
we didn't deliver him to his dad
6380600 6381601 like we was hired to do.
6381720 6384451 Yeah, that guy was a jackass.

6389320 6392935 He is gonna be so pissed when he
realizes I switched out the Orb on him.
6395640 6397483 He was gonna kill you, Peter.
6402240 6403844 But he was about the only family I had.
6458520 6459920 PETER: Why would you even know this?

6460200 6463015 DEY: When we arrested you, we noticed
an anomaly in your nervous system,
6463040 6464405 so we had it checked out.
6467520 6469045 NOVA PRIME: You are half Terran.

6469200 6472841 Your mother was of Earth.
Your father, well,

6473000 6476561 he's something very ancient
we've never seen here before.
6476880 6478120 That could be why you were able
6478200 6480441 to hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6484280 6486521 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

6486920 6489526 we'd like to express
our profound gratitude
6490360 6492089 for your help in saving Xandar.
6493880 6496611 If you will follow Denarian Dey,
6496760 6498364 he has something to show you.

6508880 6513363 Your wife and child shall rest well
knowing that you have avenged them.
6515200 6517123 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.
6517880 6520042 It's really Thanos I need to kill.

6522720 6525485 We tried to keep it as close
to the original as possible.
6526080 6528048 We salvaged as much as we could.

6545160 6547527 Your criminal records
have also been expunged.

6547680 6551685 However, I have to warn you against
breaking any laws in the future.

6553440 6554655 What if I see something
that I want to take,
6554680 6556055 and it belongs to someone else?

6557440 6559681 But what if I want it more
than the person who has it?

6560160 6562162 - It's still illegal.
- That doesn't follow.

6562320 6563367 No, I want it more, sir.
Do you understand?

6565320 6566815 Why? I can't have a discussion
with this gentleman?

6566840 6568683 What if someone
does something irksome
6568840 6571002 and I decide to remove his spine?
6578800 6581371 It's one of the worst crimes of all.
6589720 6590881 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.
6619560 6622928 I know these last few months have been hard for you.
6624200 6626771 But I'm going to a better place.
6629560 6633281 And I will always be with you.
6635000 6637685 You are the light of my life.
6767240 6768890 PETER: So, what should we do next?

7226680 7229001 HOWARD: What do you let it
lick you like that for?

lines: 39772 43264 Your momma wants to speak with you.

45210 49510 Come on, Pete.
Take these fool things off.

82881 86612 Why have you been fighting with
the other boys again, baby?
90456 94050 They killed a little frog that ain't done nothing.

107973 110642 - Composed out of pure light.
- Mer?
110742 113142 You got a present there for Peter, don't you?
128360 130691 You open it up when I'm gone, okay?
135234 137936 is gonna take such good care of you.

172638 174406 You've got to stay here. Please.

511877 514112 - Drop it, now!

517048 518517 How do you know about this?
518617 520252 I don't even know what that is.
