523088 525424 You don't look like a junker.
You're wearing Ravager garb.
525524 526792 This is just an outfit, man.

526892 529461 - Ninja Turtle, you better stop poking me.

529561 531830 My name is Peter Quill, okay?
Dude, chill out.
533431 535734 Ronan may have questions for you.

535834 539295 Hey, you know what? There's another
name you might know me by.

677842 680776 Look, I'm gonna be totally honest
with you. I forgot you're here.
704235 707405 Scattered riots broke out across the Kree Empire today
707505 711009 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor

727358 729527 Well, I was in the neighborhood.
I thought I'd save you the hassle.
729627 730895 Well, where are you at now, boy?

730995 733565 I feel really bad about this,
but I'm not gonna tell you that.
733665 736167 - I slaved putting this deal together. - Slaved?

736267 737302 Making a few calls is "slaved"?
I mean, really?
737402 738506 And now you're gonna rip me off!
738536 742040 We do not do that to each other. We're Ravagers. We got a code.

742140 744876 Yeah, and that code is
"steal from everybody."
744976 746845 - When I picked you up on Terra... - "Picked me up."
746945 748881 - ...these boys of mine wanted to eat you. - Yeah?
748981 751016 They ain't never tasted any Terran before.
751116 753351 I stopped them. You're alive because of me!
755453 758790 Put a bounty on him! Forty K.

758890 760525 - But I want him back alive.
- Yeah, Cap.

762160 764505 I told you when you picked that kid up,
you should have delivered him

764600 767265 like we was hired to do!
He was cargo!

767365 772103 - You have always been soft on him.
- You're the only one I'm being soft on!
772203 774973 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.
775073 777541 As soon as we get him back here,
780478 782275 What we do need to worry about,
783181 786081 is who else out there wants that Orb!
812377 816005 because I obey the ancient laws of my people, the Kree,
819951 823088 Because I do not forgive your people
826291 830227 and his father, and his father before him.
830962 835967 A thousand years of war between us will not be forgotten!

836067 839365 You can't do this! Our government
signed a peace treaty.
843441 846739 You Xandarians and your culture are a disease.
874973 877041 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.
877141 879677 But we have discovered he has an agreement
879777 882580 to retrieve the Orb for an intermediary known
884315 887752 I promised Thanos I would retrieve the Orb for him.
887852 890912 Only then will he destroy Xandar for me.
891356 895223 Nebula, go to Xandar and get me the Orb.
899163 901633 If this happens again, you'll be facing our father
908273 909941 Ronan has already decreed that I...
940204 944776 All of them in a big hurry to get from something stupid,
948279 949848 Can you believe they call us criminals,
949948 952283 when he's assaulting us with that haircut?

952383 955153 What is this thing?
Look how it thinks it's so cool.

955253 958857 It's not cool to get help!
Walk by yourself, you little gargoyle.
958957 961357 Look at Mr. Smiles over here.

961559 965722 Where's your wife, old man?
What a class-A prevert.
969133 971035 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
973771 975707 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.
982647 987106 Okay, humie, how bad does someone wanna find you?

988119 992783 40,000 units?
Groot, we're gonna be rich.
1014145 1015880 Wanted to be here. Sends his love.
1015980 1017015 And told me to tell you,
1017115 1019810 that you got the best eyebrows in the business.

1023321 1026691 It's my policy never to discuss
my clients, or their needs.
1026791 1028826 Yeah, well, I almost died getting it for you.
1028926 1032327 An occupational hazard, I'm sure, in your line of work.

1032530 1035260 Some machine-headed freak,
working for a dude named Ronan.

1039370 1043533 But I want no part of this
transaction if Ronan is involved.
1045376 1048613 A Kree fanatic, outraged by the peace treaty,
1048713 1053051 who will not rest until Xandarian culture, my culture,

1053151 1054860 - is wiped from existence!
- Come on.
1054961 1057322 He's someone whose bad side I'd rather not be on.

1057422 1060952 - What? What about my bad side?
- Farewell, Mr. Quill.
1062727 1064660 Hey, we had a deal, bro!

1073571 1077203 This guy just backed out of a deal on me.
If there's one thing I hate,

1077304 1081035 it's a man without integrity.
Peter Quill. People call me Star-Lord.
1082113 1084382 You have the bearing of a man of honor.
1084482 1087041 Well, you know, I wouldn't say that.
1087418 1089855 People say it about me, all the time,
1089955 1092622 but it's not something I would ever say about myself.
1114412 1116614 Put him in the bag. Put him in the bag!
1159757 1162020 I don't learn. One of my issues.

1175173 1178733 Quit smiling, you idiot.
You're supposed to be a professional.
1200531 1203034 I live for the simple things.
1203134 1205795 Like how much this is gonna hurt.
1214445 1215880 It'll grow back, you d'ast idiot.
1231362 1232797 By the authority of the Nova Corps,

1232897 1234699 - you are under arrest...
- All right. Come on up.

1234799 1236968 ...for endangerment to life and
the destruction of property.

1243708 1247311 I picked this guy up a while back for
petty theft. He's got a code name.
1247411 1248446 Yeah. Stay out of the way.

1248546 1250414 Come on, man. It's a...
It's an outlaw name.

1252316 1254875 It's cool to have a code name.
It's not that weird.

1270668 1274438 Ronan is destroying Xandarian
outposts throughout the galaxy.

1274538 1278406 I should think that would call for some
slight response on the part of the Kree.

1278510 1281379 We signed your peace treaty, Nova Prime.
What more do you want?

1281479 1285816 At least a statement from the Kree Empire
saying that they condemn his actions.

1290021 1294881 That is your business. Now,
I have other matters to attend to.

1300665 1304101 It looks like we've apprehended
one of Ronan's compatriots.

1304201 1308472 Gamora. Surgically modified and
trained as a living weapon.
1308572 1311409 The adopted daughter of the Mad Titan, Thanos.

1311509 1314679 Recently, Thanos lent her and
her sister Nebula out to Ronan,

1314779 1318049 which leads us to believe that Thanos
and Ronan are working together.
1324088 1327191 and cybernetic experiments on a lower life form.
1331128 1333598 A humanoid plant that's been travelling recently

1341272 1344342 Raised from youth by a band of
mercenaries called the Ravagers,
1347978 1350948 I didn't know how this machine worked.
1353651 1356585 Transport all four to the Kyln.
1358989 1362393 I guess most of Nova Corps wanna uphold the laws,
1362493 1366063 but these ones here, they're corrupt and cruel.

1366163 1370034 But, hey, that's not my problem.
I ain't gonna be here long.

1370134 1373604 I've escaped 22 prisons.
This one's no different.

1373704 1376274 You're lucky the broad showed up,
because otherwise, me and Groot
1376374 1378209 would be collecting that bounty right now,

1378309 1381345 and you'd be getting drawn and
quartered by Yondu and those Ravagers.
1381445 1383581 I've had a lot of folks try to kill me over the years.

1383681 1386484 I ain't about to be brought down
by a tree and a talking raccoon.
1391155 1394191 Ain't no thing like me, except me.
1394291 1396861 So, this Orb has a real shiny blue suitcase,
1396961 1400453 Ark of the Covenant, Maltese Falcon sort of vibe.

1400598 1401999 - What is it?
- I am Groot.
1403868 1406070 I have no words for an honorless thief.

1406170 1409674 Pretty high and mighty coming from
the lackey of a genocidal maniac.
1409774 1411642 Yeah, I know who you are.

1411742 1415413 - Anyone who's anyone knows who you are.
- Yeah, we know who you are.

1415513 1418015 - Who is she?
- I am Groot.

1420785 1425122 I wasn't retrieving the Orb
for Ronan. I was betraying him.
1425222 1427690 I had an agreement to sell it to a third party.

1430694 1434932 Well, that's just as fascinating as
the first 89 times you told me that.
1435032 1437201 What is wrong with Giving Tree, here?
1437301 1439503 Well, he don't know talking good like me and you.

1439603 1443674 So his vocabulistics is limited
to "I" and "am" and "Groot."
1445576 1448271 I tell you what, that's gonna wear real thin, real fast.

1454118 1456454 Listen to me, you big blue bastard.
Take those headphones off.

1456554 1460652 That's mine. Those belong to impound.
That tape and that player is mine!

1463794 1468764 Hooked on a Feeling, Blue Swede, 1973.
That song belongs to me!

1551448 1553984 Coming for you first, Gamora!
You're dead!
1564528 1566497 A lot of prisoners here have lost their families
1571802 1573337 The guards will protect her, right?
1573437 1575706 They're here to stop us from getting out.
1575806 1577775 They don't care what we do to each other inside.
1581512 1585607 are dreams compared to what's behind me.
1589186 1592923 I'm gonna slather you up in Gunavian jelly,
1601899 1605425 This one here is our booty!
1631662 1634653 No cell's gonna protect you for long.
1675773 1677541 Take her down to the showers.
1677641 1680939 It'll be easier to clean up the blood down there.
1699730 1703233 Gamora, consider this a death sentence
1703333 1705469 for your crimes against the galaxy.
1712943 1715274 You know who I am, yes?
1720317 1722286 And you know why they call me this.
1722386 1725411 You slayed dozens of Ronan's minions.
1731762 1733991 He slaughtered them where they stood.
1746009 1747635 I shall kill one of his in return.
1759456 1763153 I'm no family to Ronan or Thanos.
1772302 1774463 I'm your only hope at stopping him.
1776006 1778709 Woman, your words mean nothing to me!

1778809 1781345 - Hey! Hey, hey, hey! Hey!
- Crap.
1781445 1783614 You know, if killing Ronan is truly your sole purpose,
1783714 1785511 I don't think this is the best way to go about it.
1785716 1788852 Are you not the man this wench attempted to kill?

1788952 1791321 Well, I mean, she's hardly the first
woman to try and do that to me.

1791421 1794992 Look, this is from a
smoking-hot Rajak girl.

1795092 1798328 Stabbed me with a fork. Didn't like
me skipping out on her at sunrise.
1798428 1800998 I got, right here, a Kree girl tried to rip out my thorax.

1801098 1804268 She caught me with this skinny little
A'askavariian who worked in Nova Records.

1804368 1807771 I was trying to get information.
You ever see an A'askavariian?
1807871 1809740 They have tentacles, and needles for teeth.
1809840 1812535 If you think I'm seriously interested in that, then...
1813043 1816068 You don't care. But here's the point.

1817314 1820612 She betrayed Ronan.
He's coming back for her.
1825389 1828358 Why would I put my finger on his throat?
1832896 1837568 This is a symbol for you slicing his throat.
1837668 1839636 I would not slice his throat.
1839736 1842506 I would cut his head clean off.
1842606 1844708 It's a general expression for you killing somebody.

1844808 1846360 You've heard of this.
You've seen this, right?

1846443 1847878 - You know what that is.
- Yeah. Yeah.
1851748 1855217 What I'm saying is, you want to keep her alive.
1855452 1858284 Don't do his work for him.
1871201 1873669 I like your knife. I'm keeping it.

1874338 1876507 - That was my favorite knife.
- Listen!
1876607 1879743 I could care less whether you live or whether you die.

1879843 1883005 - Then why stop the big guy?
- Simple.
1883113 1884414 You know where to sell my Orb.
1884514 1887209 How are we gonna sell it when we and it are still here?

1892823 1895793 And then we're headed straight
to Yondu to retrieve your bounty.
1895893 1899988 How much was your buyer willing to pay you for my Orb?

1904201 1908228 That Orb is my opportunity to
get away from Thanos and Ronan.

1911675 1914945 I'll lead you to the buyer directly and I'll
split the profit between the three of us.

1918382 1921951 Asleep for the danger, awake for
the money, as per frickin' usual.
1926423 1928550 We know only that she has been captured.
1929092 1931161 Gamora may yet recover the Orb.

1931261 1935699 No! Our sources within the Kyln say
Gamora has her own plans for the Orb.

1950547 1954351 With all due respect, Thanos,
your daughter made this mess,
1956053 1957955 I would lower my voice, Accuser.
1958055 1960123 First, she lost a battle with some primitive.
1960223 1962092 Thanos put Gamora under your charge.
1962192 1964962 Then she was apprehended by the Nova Corps.
1965062 1966864 You are the one here with nothing to show for it.

1966964 1971068 Your sources say that she meant
to betray us the whole time!
1981812 1986180 I only ask that you take this matter seriously.
1986850 1990854 The only matter I do not take seriously, boy,
1995625 1998695 Your demeanor is that of a pouty child.

1998795 2003959 And, apparently, you alienated
my favorite daughter, Gamora.
2006003 2009039 I shall honor our agreement, Kree,
2009139 2011402 if you bring me the Orb.
2011842 2014833 But return to me again empty-handed,
2014945 2018312 and I will bathe the starways in your blood.
2025389 2028585 This is one fight you won't win.

2039569 2042673 If we're gonna get out of here, we're
gonna need to get into that watchtower.
2042773 2044900 And to do that, I'm gonna need a few things.

2045375 2049980 The guards wear security bands to
control their ins and outs. I need one.

2051615 2054418 That dude, there.
I need his prosthetic leg.

2056353 2058855 God knows I don't need the rest of him.
Look at him, he's useless.

2060057 2064361 And finally, on the wall back there
is a black panel. Blinky yellow light.

2066530 2070667 There's a quarnyx battery behind it.
Purplish box, green wires.
2070767 2072903 To get into that watchtower, I definitely need it.
2073003 2074404 How are we supposed to do that?

2074504 2076773 Well, supposably,
these bald-bodies find you attractive.
2076873 2078508 So, maybe you can work out some sort of trade.
2079843 2081611 No, I really heard they find you attractive.
2081711 2083313 Look, it's 20 feet up in the air,

2083413 2085816 and it's in the middle of the most
heavily-guarded part of the prison.
2085916 2088685 It's impossible to get up there without being seen.

2088785 2091989 I got one plan, and that plan
requires a frickin' quarnyx battery,
2094591 2096526 Can I get back to it? Thanks.

2096626 2100197 Now, this is important.
Once the battery is removed,
2100297 2102666 everything is gonna slam into emergency mode.

2102766 2108902 Once we have it, we gotta move quickly,
so you definitely need to get that last.
2114144 2116279 Or we could just get it first and improvise.

2130560 2134598 Prisoner, drop the device immediately
and retreat to your cell,
2161658 2164456 All prisoners return to your sleeping areas.
2171101 2174297 How am I supposed to fight these things without my stuff?
2254217 2257277 Drop the leg and move back to your cell!
2311274 2313332 Man who has lain with an A'askavariian!
2318181 2321172 We need all available guards in full combat gear...
2343106 2345039 Spare me your foul gaze, woman.

2347310 2349846 We promised him he could stay by
your side until he kills your boss.

2349946 2352882 I always keep my promises,

2352982 2354710 who will kill me if I don't. Here you go.

2355051 2357854 I was just kidding about the leg.
I just need these two things.

2357954 2359656 - What?
- No, I thought it'd be funny.

2359756 2362659 Was it funny? Wait, what did
he look like hopping around?
2362759 2365159 I had to transfer him 30,000 units!
2367597 2369155 How are we going to leave?

2370800 2374137 Well, he's got a plan. Right?
Or is that another thing you made up?
2374237 2375839 I have a plan! I have a plan!

2375939 2379276 Cease your yammering and relieve
us from this irksome confinement.

2379376 2382646 Yeah, I'll have to agree with the
walking thesaurus on that one.
2382746 2385680 Do not ever call me a thesaurus.

2387217 2390086 His people are completely literal.
Metaphors are gonna go over his head.
2391988 2395548 My reflexes are too fast. I would catch it.

2395759 2400025 I'm gonna die surrounded by
the biggest idiots in the galaxy.

2413476 2416339 - Rodent, we are ready for your plan.
- Hold on!

2420116 2424220 I recognize this animal. We'd roast

2424320 2426923 - Their flesh was quite delicious.
- Not helping!
2456052 2457921 He turned off the artificial gravity,
2498695 2501060 I told you I had a plan.
2523286 2525014 That was a pretty good plan.
2535899 2537400 Yeah! There it is. Get my ship.

2537500 2540170 It's the Milano, the orange and
blue one over in the corner.
2540270 2542071 They crumpled my pants up into a ball.
2557253 2559322 That bastard didn't put it back.
2562125 2563827 Get them to the ship. I will be right back.

2563927 2566496 - How are you gonna possibly...
- Just keep the Milano close by.
2596125 2597760 Well, how's he gonna get to us?
2597860 2599796 He declined to share that information with me.

2601698 2605268 I ain't waiting around for some humie with
a death wish. You got the Orb, right?
2629592 2632295 If we don't leave now, we will be blown to bits.
2633463 2635931 We're not leaving without the Orb.
2655118 2658054 He shall make a keen ally in the battle against Ronan.
2678975 2680476 Yo, Ranger Rick! What are you doing?
2680576 2683179 You can't take apart my ship without asking me!

2683279 2685114 - See, what is this?
- Don't touch that!
2687450 2689152 And you leave it lying around?
2689252 2690853 I was gonna put it in a box.

2692155 2694357 - How about this one?
- No! Hey!

2694457 2695458 - Leave it alone.
- Why? What is it?
2699529 2702632 That's for if things get really hardcore.
2702732 2703967 Or if you wanna blow up moons.
2705702 2707870 You just wanna suck the joy out of everything.
2707970 2710495 So, listen, I'm gonna need your buyer's coordinates.

2710606 2713376 We're heading in the
right direction. For now.

2713476 2716012 If we're gonna work together,
you might try trusting me a little bit.
2716112 2717614 And how much do you trust me?
2717714 2721149 I'd trust you a lot more if you told me what this was.
2721617 2724587 Because I'm guessing it's some kind of weapon.
2724687 2725989 I don't know what it is.
2726089 2728424 If it's a weapon, we should use it against Ronan.

2728524 2730460 Put it down, you fool.
You'll destroy us all.
2731728 2733396 I let you live once, princess!

2733496 2735598 - I am not a princess!
- Hey!
2735698 2739725 Nobody is killing anybody on my ship!
2740002 2743573 We're stuck together until we get the money.
2743673 2745875 I have no interest in money.
2748511 2752071 That means more money for the three of us.
2754283 2757453 For the four of us. Partners.

2757553 2761246 We have an agreement, but I would
never be partners with the likes of you.
2761657 2763818 I'll tell the buyer we're on our way.
2764460 2768157 And Quill, your ship is filthy.
2774470 2776439 If I had a black light,
2776539 2779507 the place would look like a Jackson Pollock painting.

2789152 2793179 I swear. I don't know where
they went! I swear.

2793756 2796159 If he knew where they were headed,
he would have already told us.
2797794 2802031 Ronan, the Nova Corps sent a fleet to defend the prison.

2802131 2806569 Well, then, send Necrocraft to
every corner of the quadrant.
2806669 2810139 Find the Orb. Any means, any price.

2810239 2813741 - And this place?
- The Nova can't know what we're after.
2819549 2821984 Do you got any other cute little buggers like this one?
2822084 2826089 I like to stick 'em all in a row on my control console.
2826189 2828291 I can't tell if you're joking or not.
2830626 2833321 In that case, I can show you...
2833429 2835798 But first, you gonna tell me what this Orb is,
2835898 2838559 and why everybody cares so damn much about it.
2838701 2840503 And then you gonna tell me,
2840603 2842739 who out there might wanna buy it.
2842839 2846001 Sir, the high-end community is a...

2853549 2855744 The high-end community
is a very tight-knit...
2871334 2874166 Now, who again is this buyer of yours?
2880076 2883513 Your people do have elbows, do they not?
2889418 2890820 I don't have to remind you
2890920 2894390 what happened to the last attendant who disappointed me.

2898494 2903226 Chop, chop. Our guests
will be here soon.
2932662 2935932 The severed head of an ancient celestial being.
2939001 2942629 There are no regulations whatsoever here.
2966529 2969365 Hundreds of years ago, the Tivan Group sent workers in
2969465 2972034 to mine the organic matter within the skull.

2974537 2979642 All rare resources, highly valued
in black markets across the galaxy.

2979742 2983379 It's dangerous and illegal work,
suitable only for outlaws.
2983479 2985674 Well, I come from a planet of outlaws.
2985781 2989151 Billy the Kid, Bonnie and Clyde, John Stamos.
2989251 2990753 It sounds like a place, which I would like to visit.

2994457 2997289 - Watch your wallets.
- Can you spare any units?
3013576 3015478 We are to wait here for his representative.
3019515 3022040 What do you expect us to do while we wait?
3043839 3046102 as I won at all things!
3046308 3049045 Now, let's put more of this liquid into our bodies.

3049145 3053513 That's the first thing you said
that wasn't bat-shit crazy!

3054525 3056594 Man, you wouldn't believe what
they charge for fuel out here.

3056619 3061057 - I might actually lose money on this job.
- My connection is making us wait.

3061157 3065194 It's just a negotiation tactic.
Trust me, this is my specialty.

3065294 3070626 Where yours is more,
"Stab, stab. Those are my terms."

3071400 3074559 - My father didn't stress diplomacy.
- Thanos?

3078507 3082739 When Thanos took my home world,
he killed my parents in front of me.
3083279 3087683 He tortured me, turned me into a weapon.

3087783 3091821 When he said he was going to destroy
an entire planet for Ronan,
3098794 3101228 Why would you risk your life for this?
3102865 3104889 My mother gave it to me.

3106469 3109205 My mom liked sharing with me all the
pop songs that she loved growing up.
3109305 3110673 I happened to have it on me,
3117613 3119842 You know, when I left Earth.
3120282 3121584 What do you do with it?

3121684 3125421 Do? Nothing. You listen to it.
Or you can dance.

3125521 3130192 I'm a warrior and an assassin.
I do not dance.
3131660 3135865 On my planet, there's a legend about people like you.
3139001 3143072 And in it, a great hero

3145341 3150505 teaches an entire city full of people with
sticks up their butts that dancing, well...
3151247 3153612 It's the greatest thing there is.
3154016 3155651 Who put the sticks up their butts?

3157319 3159188 - That is cruel.
- It's just a phrase
3201630 3203032 I know who you are, Peter Quill!

3203132 3206435 And I am not some starry-eyed
waif here to succumb to your...
3208837 3210702 That is not what is happening here.
3229592 3232728 This vermin speaks of affairs he knows nothing about!

3232828 3234797 - That is true!
- He has no respect!

3234897 3237299 - That is also true!
- Hold on! Hold on!
3237399 3239568 Keep calling me vermin, tough guy!
3239668 3241737 You just wanna laugh at me like everyone else!

3241837 3244440 Rocket, you're drunk. All right?
No one's laughing at you.

3244540 3247309 He thinks I'm some
stupid thing! He does!
3247409 3249812 Well, I didn't ask to get made!
3249912 3251981 I didn't ask to be torn apart,
3252081 3254083 and put back together, over and over
3257720 3259688 Rocket, no one's calling you a monster.
3264827 3266162 Let's see if you can laugh
3266262 3269398 after five or six good shots to your frickin' face!

3269498 3273302 No, no, no, no!
Four billion units! Rocket!

3273402 3277696 Come on, man. Hey! Suck it up for one
more lousy night and you're rich.

3288332 3290886 when all this is over I'm not gonna
kill every last one of you jerks.

3290986 3294944 See? That's exactly why none
of you have any friends!

3295090 3297726 Five seconds after you meet somebody,
you're already trying to kill them!
3297826 3301830 We have travelled, halfway across the quadrant.
3301930 3304398 And Ronan is no closer to being dead.
3314343 3316606 I'm here to fetch you for my master.
3322451 3324753 Okay, this isn't creepy at all.
3324853 3328151 We house the galaxy's largest collection
3328390 3331290 of fauna, relics, and species of all manner.
3359588 3362091 How wonderful to meet in the flesh.
3379141 3380843 I never thought I'd meet a Groot.

3383112 3386415 You must allow me to pay you now
so that I may own your carcass.
3386515 3389451 At the moment of your death, of course.
3390953 3393722 Why, so he could turn you into a frickin' chair?

3398394 3402231 We have been halfway around
the galaxy, retrieving this Orb.
3404533 3407501 Let us see what you brought.
3420707 3423510 Three quarnyx batteries, seven cases of Cotati seeds.
3423610 3427409 No, cases. Last time, you sent me...
3428548 3431785 You shall send a message for me.
3441961 3445732 Then the universe exploded into existence,
3445832 3447934 and the remnants of these systems

3467187 3472993 These carriers can use the Stone
to mow down entire civilizations
3478098 3480828 There's a little pee coming out of me right now.
3482569 3486673 a group was able to share the energy amongst themselves,
3486773 3490208 but even they were quickly destroyed by it.

3504057 3508186 We're all very fascinated, whitey.
But we'd like to get paid.
3509629 3511097 How would you like to get paid?
3511197 3513688 What do you think, fancy man? Units!
3524711 3527414 I will no longer be your slave!

3586807 3589609 How could I think Tivan could contain
whatever was within the Orb?

3589709 3593213 - What do you still have it for?
- What are we gonna do, leave it in there?

3593313 3597183 - I can't believe you had that in your purse!
- It's not a purse, it's a knapsack!

3597283 3600954 We have to bring this to the Nova Corps.
There's a chance they can contain it.

3601054 3603858 Are you kidding me?
We're wanted by the Nova Corps.

3603959 3606493 - Just give it to Ronan!
- So he can destroy the galaxy?
3606593 3608394 What are you, some saint all of a sudden?

3608494 3611498 What has the galaxy ever done for you?
Why would you wanna save it?
3611598 3613399 Because I'm one of the idiots who lives in it!

3613499 3618271 Peter, listen to me. We cannot allow
the Stone to fall into Ronan's hands.
3618371 3621708 We have to go back to your ship, and deliver it to Nova.
3621808 3624640 Right, right, okay. I think you're right.

3624978 3628948 Or we could give it to somebody
who's not going to arrest us,
3629048 3632218 who's really nice for a whole lot of money.

3632318 3634854 I think it's a really good balance
between both of your points of view.
3644097 3646666 I shall meet my foe and destroy him.
3657543 3660102 Don't you move! Get out of the way!
3666085 3668621 You are the one who transmitted the message?

3680266 3684532 I told you, you can't fit.
Now, wait here. I'll be back.

3689709 3693508 It is Gamora. She is
escaping with the Orb.
3723576 3725941 The Stone is in the furthest pod.
3756042 3759245 Rocket, keep them off Gamora until she gets to the Milano.

3759345 3761781 How? We've got no
weaponry on these things.
3852371 3854634 I don't recall killing your family.
3857477 3861344 I doubt I'll remember killing you, either.

3877497 3880795 Quill, I'm trapped.
I can't make it to the Milano.

3884470 3886904 Wait! These things aren't
meant to go out there.

3904323 3906518 - he'll kill us all.
- Not all.
3971624 3974160 Her body mods should keep her alive a couple more minutes,
3974260 3976329 but there's nothing we can do for her.
3976429 3977997 These pods aren't meant to be out here.
3978097 3980963 In a second, we're gonna be in the same boat.
4003222 4005815 If you're there, come get me.

4023075 4026601 You can't fit two people in there.
You're gonna die.
4101187 4104121 I don't know what came over me.
4104623 4106886 But I couldn't let you die.
4109261 4112161 I found something inside of myself.
4125144 4127446 It's... Well, they got the Orb.

4163149 4167520 None of this ever would have happened
if you didn't try to single-handedly
4186472 4189236 was just to cover my loss.
4201253 4203522 I don't care if it's mean!
4206158 4207893 It's no excuse to get everybody else
4213732 4216469 Come on, Groot. Ronan has the Stone.

4216569 4219772 The only chance we got is to get
to the other side of the universe
4219872 4221841 as fast as we can and maybe,

4221941 4227037 just maybe, we'll be able to live full lives
before that whack-job ever gets there.
4235955 4238591 I know they're the only friends that we ever had,
4238691 4241494 but there's an army of Ravagers around them.
4241594 4243652 And there's only two of us!
4262248 4264443 The Orb is in my possession,
4274360 4277963 and you will destroy Xandar for me.
4278063 4282668 However, now that I know it contains an Infinity Stone,
4282768 4284870 I wonder what use I have for you.
4286805 4289671 I would reconsider your current course.
4292811 4295779 Thanos is the most powerful being in the universe.
4322841 4327446 I will unfurl 1,000 years of Kree justice on Xandar,
4327546 4331116 and burn it to its core!
4337656 4340960 After Xandar, you are going to kill my father?
4343062 4344864 You see what he has turned me into.

4344964 4349696 If you kill him, I will help you
destroy a thousand planets.
4355574 4357710 When I picked you up as a kid,
4357810 4360212 these boys wanted to eat you.
4360312 4362815 They ain't never tasted Terran before.
4364683 4366919 Will you shut up about that? God!
4367019 4369321 Twenty years, you been throwing that in my face,
4369421 4372124 like it's some great thing, not eating me.
4372224 4375861 Normal people don't even think about eating someone else!
4375961 4378497 Much less that person having to be grateful for it!
4380733 4383035 You stole me from my home and from my family.
4383135 4385671 You don't give a damn about your Terra!
4393045 4395281 Ronan has something called an Infinity Stone.
4395381 4397316 I know what he's got, girl.
4397416 4399752 Then you know we must get it back!
4399852 4403322 He's gonna use it to wipe out Xandar.

4403422 4406425 We have to warn them.
Billions of people will perish.
4406525 4409161 Is that what she's been filling your head with, boy?
4411764 4414027 Eating away your brain like maggots!

4423175 4426745 But a captain's gotta teach his men
what happens to those what cross him.

4433352 4437879 you are saying goodbye to the
biggest score you have ever seen.
4444797 4446799 I hope you got something better than that.
4446899 4449993 Because ain't nobody stealing from Ronan.
4454773 4457209 She knows everything there is to know about Ronan.
4463048 4464350 Hey, what do you say, Yondu?

4464450 4468477 Me and you, taking down a mark
side-by-side, like the old days.
4478530 4481133 You always did have a scrote, boy!
4481233 4484429 That's why I kept you on as a young'un.

4498684 4502521 The lunatic on top of this craft
is holding a Hadron Enforcer.
4502621 4504390 It's a weapon of my own design.
4506091 4508861 If you don't hand over our companions now,
4508961 4511330 he's gonna tear your ship a new one.

4513365 4516635 - I ain't buyin' it.
- I'm giving you to the count of five.
4520005 4521840 Rocket, it's me, for God sakes!
4521940 4524009 We figured it out! We're fine!
4528947 4531316 We're gonna rob the guys who just beat us senseless.
4531416 4532851 You want to talk about senseless?
4532951 4535220 How about trying to save us by blowing us up?

4535320 4538157 We were only gonna blow you
up if they didn't turn you over!
4538257 4540125 And how on earth were they gonna turn us over
4540225 4541760 when you only gave them a count of five?
4541860 4545364 We didn't have time to work out the minutiae of the plan.
4545464 4547733 This is what we get for acting altruistically.

4547833 4550002 - I am Groot.
- They are ungrateful.

4550102 4554173 What's important now is we get the
Ravagers' army to help us save Xandar.

4554473 4558043 So we can give the Stone to Yondu who's
just gonna sell to somebody even worse?

4558143 4561213 - We'll figure that part out later.
- We have to stop Ronan.

4562881 4565451 - I have a plan.
- You've got a plan?

4566719 4569140 First of all, you're copying me
from when I said I had a plan.

4569241 4572758 No, I'm not. People say that all the time.
It's not that unique of a thing to say.
4572858 4574760 Secondly, I don't even believe you have a plan.
4574860 4577663 I have part of a plan!
4577763 4579298 What percentage of a plan do you have?

4579398 4582601 You don't get to ask questions after
the nonsense you pulled on Knowhere.

4584436 4587172 We've already established that you destroying
the ship that I'm on is not saving me.

4587272 4589508 - When did we establish it?
- Like three seconds ago!

4589608 4591632 I wasn't listening. I was
thinking of something else.

4592277 4595347 She's right. You don't get an opinion.
What percentage?

4595447 4598679 - I don't know. Twelve percent.
- Twelve percent?

4603355 4608026 That is the most real, authentic,
hysterical laugh of my entire life

4608126 4610562 - because that is not a plan.
- It's barely a concept.

4610662 4613265 - You're taking their side?
- I am Groot.

4613365 4616301 So what, it's better than 11%? What the
hell does that have to do with anything?

4619137 4623038 See? Groot's the only one
of you who has a clue.
4630716 4632718 Yondu is gonna be here in two seconds.
4632818 4635786 He expects to hear this big plan of ours.
4652571 4655198 And we have. Man, we have. All of us.

4662481 4665677 And, usually, life takes more
than it gives. But not today.
4667753 4669354 It has given us a chance.
4681600 4684102 I, for one, am not gonna stand by and watch
4684202 4687728 as Ronan wipes out billions of innocent lives.
4723608 4727407 I have lived most my life surrounded by my enemies.
4730982 4735646 I will be grateful to die among my friends.
4739491 4741891 You are an honorable man, Quill.
4750001 4752492 I will see my wife and daughter again.

4771490 4775187 What the hell. I don't got
that long a lifespan, anyway.
4785804 4789501 Bunch of jackasses, standing in a circle.
4796281 4797849 The Stone reacts to anything organic.
4797949 4799985 The bigger the target, the bigger the power surge.

4800085 4803322 All Ronan's got to do is touch the
Stone to the planet's surface and zap.
4807359 4809759 So Ronan does not make the surface.
4812264 4814299 Rocket will lead a team to blow a hole
4814399 4816601 in the Dark Aster's starboard hull.
4816701 4820772 Then, our craft and Yondu's will enter.
4820872 4823642 Won't there be hundreds of Sakaaran soldiers inside?
4823742 4827040 I think of Sakaaran as paper people.
4832417 4833852 Once they know we're on board,

4833952 4837356 Ronan will isolate himself behind
impenetrable security doors on deck.
4837456 4839958 Which I can disable by dismantling the power source.
4840058 4841760 We'll make it to the flight deck,
4841860 4845329 and I'll use the Hadron Enforcer to kill Ronan.
4847432 4850902 Once Ronan is dead, we will retrieve the Stone.
4851002 4853438 Use these devices to contain it.
4859778 4863014 I'll contact one of the Nova officers who arrested us.
4863114 4866208 Hopefully, they'll believe we're there to help.
4866318 4869946 There's one more thing we need to complete the plan.
4872390 4874960 No! No, we don't. No, we don't need

4877496 4880556 No, seriously, I need it!
It's important to me.

4884769 4887706 Ronan's fleet has been spotted,
and will arrive in T-minus
4891743 4893678 At the end of all this,
4895213 4898113 You cross me, we kill you all.

4932551 4935110 Hey, you're the one who said
you wanted to die among friends.

4945463 4948099 He says Ronan's in possession of
something called an Infinity Stone
4951036 4953004 It's a trick. He's a criminal.
4953104 4955574 Did he say why we should believe him?
4955674 4957909 He said his crew just escaped from prison

4958009 4961444 so he'd have no other reason to
risk coming to Xandar to help.
4972991 4976027 I don't know that I believe anyone is 100% a dick, ma'am.
4976127 4979528 I mean, do you believe that he is here to help?
5057742 5061700 Our priority is to get our people away from the battle.
5112664 5114466 No more games with me, boy!
5123808 5125673 There are too many of them, Rocket!
5125977 5128172 We'll never make it up there!
5144028 5146464 This is Denarian Saal of the Nova Corps.
5146564 5149934 For the record, I advised against trusting you here.
5193945 5195513 The starboard kern has been breached!
5198583 5199918 But the Nova Corps have engaged.
5200018 5202687 None of that will matter once we reach the surface.
5221973 5226411 All Nova pilots, interlock and form a blockade.
5226511 5230811 The Dark Aster must not reach the ground.
5315466 5317669 When did you learn to do that?
5321773 5324741 The flight deck is 300 meters this way.

5327545 5331349 I want you all to know that I am grateful
for your acceptance after my blunders.
5331449 5334144 It is pleasing to once again have
5340725 5343284 This dumb tree, he is my friend.

5344963 5348264 - And this green whore, she, too...
- You must stop!

5350702 5356307 Gamora, look at what you have done.
You have always been weak.
5363715 5366479 Nobody talks to my friends like that.

5367151 5371479 Head to the flight deck. I'll shut
down the power to the security doors.
5380999 5384957 Order your men to turn on the Nova Corps.
5463147 5464983 Denarian Saal, should we break formation?
5499951 5501586 We'll take care of the people down here.
5501686 5504313 I can't believe I'm taking orders from a hamster.
5533618 5536916 You will never make it to Ronan.
5542193 5544923 Everybody shoot them before they hit the ground.
5597315 5601251 Finger to the throat means death.
5644295 5647365 Your wretched peace treaty will not
5649166 5652863 It is the tinder on which you burn.
5709827 5712396 but we're getting our asses kicked down here.
6073357 6077461 Only that my father and his father
6138922 6141720 I'm distracting you, you big turd blossom.
6268719 6271551 We're the Guardians of the Galaxy.
6309326 6311862 But you got some business to attend to

6318435 6322539 You gotta reconsider this, Yondu.
I don't know who you're selling this to,

6322639 6326868 but the only way the universe can survive
is if you give it to the Nova Corps.
6327244 6329871 I may be as pretty as an angel,
6331682 6334013 but I sure as hell ain't one.

6357708 6361439 Do not open that Orb.
You know that, right?
6361611 6364545 You've seen what it does to people.
6377928 6380564 It's probably good we didn't deliver him to his dad
6380664 6381665 like we was hired to do.
6381765 6384961 Yeah, that guy was a jackass.

6389373 6393400 He is gonna be so pissed when he
realizes I switched out the Orb on him.
6395679 6397976 He was gonna kill you, Peter.
6402285 6404377 But he was about the only family I had.
6458575 6460143 Why would you even know this?

6460243 6462980 When we arrested you, we noticed
an anomaly in your nervous system,
6463080 6464945 so we had it checked out.

6469252 6472956 Your mother was of Earth.
Your father, well,
6473056 6476827 he's something very ancient we've never seen here before.

6476927 6480956 That could be why you were able to
hold the Stone for as long as you did.
6484301 6486870 On behalf of the Nova Corps,

6486970 6492568 we'd like to express our profound
gratitude for your help in saving Xandar.
6493944 6496713 If you will follow Denarian Dey,

6496813 6500577 - he has something to show you.
- Thank you, Nova Prime.

6508925 6513830 Your wife and child shall rest well
knowing that you have avenged them.
6515265 6517630 Of course, Ronan was only a puppet.
6517934 6520561 It's really Thanos I need to kill.
6522772 6526002 We tried to keep it as close to the original as possible.
6526143 6528577 We salvaged as much as we could.
6545228 6547664 Your criminal records have also been expunged.

6547764 6552166 However, I have to warn you against
breaking any laws in the future.

6552335 6554638 Question. What if I see
something that I want to take,

6554738 6557407 - and it belongs to someone else?
- You will be arrested.
6557507 6560110 But what if I want it more than the person who has it?

6560210 6562012 - It's still illegal.
- That doesn't follow.

6562112 6564848 No, I want it more, sir. Do you
understand? What are you laughing at?

6564948 6566783 Why? I can't have a discussion
with this gentleman?
6566883 6568785 What if someone does something irksome
6568885 6571546 and I decide to remove his spine?
6578862 6581465 It's one of the worst crimes of all.
6589739 6590974 I'm gonna keep an eye on 'em.
6619603 6623402 I know these last few months have been hard for you.
6624241 6626910 But I'm going to a better place.
6629613 6633810 And I will always be with you.
6635051 6637787 You are the light of my life.
6767317 6769185 So, what should we do next?
7226742 7229506 What do you let it lick you like that for?

subtitles.author: lesaigneur
lines:
39480 41393 Your momma wants
to speak with you.

82640 85883 Why have you been fighting
with the other boys again, baby?

90160 92897 They killed a little frog
that ain't done nothing.

107680 110331 Composed out of pure light.
Mer?

110675 112509 You got a present there for Peter,
don't you?
128080 130144 You open it up when I'm gone, ok?
134389 137040 is gonna take such good care of you.

137760 141029 At least until your daddy
comes back to get you.
516760 518285 How do you know about this?
518360 519830 I don't even know what that is.

519854 522521 I'm just a junker, man.
I was just checking stuff out.

522575 525278 You don't look like a junker.
You're wearing Ravager garb.
525280 526598 This is just an outfit, man.

526600 528377 Ninja Turtle, you better
stop poking me.

529280 531792 My name is Peter Quill, ok?
Dude, chill out.
533330 535083 Ronan may have questions for you.

536055 538142 Hey, you know what, there is another
name you might know me by.

677703 679320 Look, I'm gonna be totally
honest with you.
704314 707345 Scattered riots broke out across the Kree Empire today
707446 710894 protesting the recent peace treaty signed by the Kree Emperor

727230 729427 Well, I was in the neighborhood.
I thought I'd save you the hassle.
729432 730718 Well, where are you at now, boy?

730720 733291 I feel really bad about this,
but I'm not gonna tell you that.
733630 735844 I slaved putting this deal together. Slaved?
735846 738037 Making a few calls is slaved? It's really... And now you're gonna rip me off!
738345 740080 We do not do that to each other.

742100 744631 Yeah and that code is
steal from everybody.
744720 746211 When I picked you up on Terra...
746277 748242 Picked me up. These boys of mine wanted to eat you.
748782 750513 They ain't never tasted any Terran before.
750759 753081 I stopped them. You're alive because of me!

758640 760358 But I want him back alive.
Yeah, Cap.
761953 763595 I told you when you picked that kid up,

763597 765368 you should have delivered him
like we was hired to do!
767120 768960 You have always been soft on him.
769070 771411 You're the only one I'm being soft on!
772159 774366 Now, don't you worry about Mr. Quill.
774903 776600 As soon as we get him back here,
780309 781961 What we do need to worry about,
783009 784895 Is who else out there wants that Orb!

812268 815916 because I obey the ancient laws
of my people, the Kree,
816510 819169 and punish those who do not.
819817 822576 Because I do not forgive your people
822578 824949 for taking the life of my father,

830993 835244 A thousand years of war between us
will not be forgotten!
836795 838745 Our government signed a peace treaty.

843206 847017 You Xandarians and your culture
are a disease.
874433 877133 an outlaw who calls himself Star-Lord.

877242 879518 But we have discovered
he has an agreement

879520 883816 to retrieve the Orb for an
intermediary known as The Broker.

884040 887522 I promised Thanos
I would retrieve the Orb for him.

887732 890512 Only then will he destroy
Xandar for me.

891295 894953 Nebula, go to Xandar
and get me the Orb.

900520 903100 you'll be facing our
father without his prize.
908229 909798 Ronan has already decreed that I...

940193 944534 All of them in a big hurry
to get from something stupid,
948141 949679 Can you believe they call us criminals,

949680 951830 when he's assaulting us
with that haircut?

952308 955128 What is this thing?
Look how it thinks it's so cool.
955136 956454 It's not cool to get help!

956456 958562 Walk by yourself,
you little gargoyle.
958842 961028 Look at Mr. Smiles over here.
969009 970638 Don't drink fountain water, you idiot.
973520 975559 Yes, you did. I just saw you doing it.

984326 986829 how bad does someone
wanna find you?

1015021 1016921 Sends his love.
And told me to tell you,

1016940 1019381 that you got the best eyebrows
in the business.
